The Hinrich foundation provides an opportunity for the students who want to study in Hong Kong as it removes all the burden of the Cost of attendance from the students. Awardees of the Hinrich Full Scholarship for MAIJS in HKBU can gain invaluable international exposure to build both professional as well as personal networks.

scholarship_name: Joint Japan/World Bank Graduate Scholarship Program
description:
The Joint Japan/World Bank Graduate Scholarship Program (JJ/WBGSP) is one of the two programs offered under the World Bank Scholarship programs. It is a fully-funded scholarship program that invites applications from working professionals from developing countries to study master’s degree programs in development-related fields.

Joint Japan/World Bank Graduate Scholarship Program has helped to form a community of over 6,000 well-trained and experienced development professionals, transforming their countries and impacting future generations.

eligibility_criteria.description: In order to avail the benefits of the Joint Japan/World Bank Graduate Scholarship Program, applicants must be admitted to a master’s degree program.Applicants from developing countries must fulfill the eligibility criteria listed below:A national of a World Bank member of developing countryNot hold dual citizenship of any developed countryMust hold a Bachelor’s (or equivalent) degree.Must be in good healthMust be a full time paid employee in anydevelopment-related workwhile submitting the scholarship application.Three years of relevant experience in related areas is mandatory.Must have an unconditional admission letter to any one of the partner or preferred master’s programs offered by JJ/WBGSP.It can on or before the application deadline.An admission letter must be uploaded before submitting the scholarship application.Must have takenexams to study abroad.Executive Director, any staff member or any close relative is ineligible.Note:Information is subject to change between the close of one application process and the opening of the next.
eligibility_criteria.html_content:
In order to avail the benefits of the Joint Japan/World Bank Graduate Scholarship Program, applicants must be admitted to a master’s degree program.

Applicants from developing countries must fulfill the eligibility criteria listed below:

  • A national of a World Bank member of developing country
  • Not hold dual citizenship of any developed country
  • Must hold a Bachelor’s (or equivalent) degree.
  • Must be in good health
  • Must be a full time paid employee in any development-related work while submitting the scholarship application.
    • Three years of relevant experience in related areas is mandatory.
  • Must have an unconditional admission letter to any one of the partner or preferred master’s programs offered by JJ/WBGSP.
    • It can on or before the application deadline.
  • An admission letter must be uploaded before submitting the scholarship application.
  • Must have taken exams to study abroad.
  • Executive Director, any staff member or any close relative is ineligible.

Note: Information is subject to change between the close of one application process and the opening of the next.

application_process.description: The Joint Japan/World Bank Graduate Scholarship Program applications must be submitted online. JJ/WBGSP 2020 applications should includeTwo professional referencesAn unconditional offer letter from the Preferred/ Partner master’s degree program.While the application requirements are the same for both Preferred and Partner Programs, the application process varies.Preferred Master’s ProgramsAll an applicant has to do is complete the program admission form. After securing admission in any one of the preferred programs, an applicant can apply for the JJ/WBGSP scholarship application.Partner Master’s ProgramsAn applicant must apply for admission to one or more of the Partner Master's programs. After reviewing submitted applications, each Partner Master's Degree Program will shortlist eligible candidates.JJ/WBGSP Secretariat will then invite the eligible candidates to apply for the scholarship.Exact dates will be communicated in the fall 2025.The applicant will be notified three times via email during a successful application process.Applicants are advised to not fill the application form using mobile phones.
application_process.html_content:
The Joint Japan/World Bank Graduate Scholarship Program applications must be submitted online. JJ/WBGSP 2020 applications should include

  • Two professional references
  • An unconditional offer letter from the Preferred/ Partner master’s degree program.

While the application requirements are the same for both Preferred and Partner Programs, the application process varies.

Preferred Master’s Programs

All an applicant has to do is complete the program admission form. After securing admission in any one of the preferred programs, an applicant can apply for the JJ/WBGSP scholarship application.

Partner Master’s Programs

An applicant must apply for admission to one or more of the Partner Master's programs. After reviewing submitted applications, each Partner Master's Degree Program will shortlist eligible candidates.

JJ/WBGSP Secretariat will then invite the eligible candidates to apply for the scholarship.

  • Exact dates will be communicated in the fall 2025.
  • The applicant will be notified three times via email during a successful application process.

Applicants are advised to not fill the application form using mobile phones.

selection_process.description: The selection of The Joint Japan/World Bank Graduate Scholarship Program recipients is a rigorous process. The panel aims to identify candidates with the highest potential. It is significant to evaluate the recipients who will contribute to the development of their country after completing the graduate study.TheJoint Japan/World Bank Graduate Scholarship ProgramSelection Step IEvaluation of application will be done by two qualified assessors. Rating will be given on a scale of 1-10 taking into accountfour main factors:Quality of Professional Experience (30% weight)Quality of Professional Recommendations (30% weight)Quality of Commitment to return to Home Country (30% weight)Quality of Education Background (10% weight)TheJoint Japan/World Bank Graduate Scholarship ProgramSelection Step IIThe JJ/WBGSP Secretariat will take into consideration the average score given by two assessors and the following criteria to select the finalists:Maintaining a wide geographical distribution of awardsMaintaining distribution of awards across genderOffering scholarships to applicants who are in need of financial aid tostudy abroad.Unusual conditions, when judging employment experience and other aspects of an application.Recipients of the scholarship will be informed only after the approval of theJJWBG Steering Committee.This will take place aroundmid-July 2023.Successful applicants will be asked to submit a copy of passport for identification and health certificate (21 days after the scholarship has been granted)
selection_process.html_content:
The selection of The Joint Japan/World Bank Graduate Scholarship Program recipients is a rigorous process. The panel aims to identify candidates with the highest potential. It is significant to evaluate the recipients who will contribute to the development of their country after completing the graduate study.

The Joint Japan/World Bank Graduate Scholarship Program Selection Step I

Evaluation of application will be done by two qualified assessors. Rating will be given on a scale of 1-10 taking into account four main factors:

  1. Quality of Professional Experience (30% weight)
  2. Quality of Professional Recommendations (30% weight)
  3. Quality of Commitment to return to Home Country (30% weight)
  4. Quality of Education Background (10% weight)

The Joint Japan/World Bank Graduate Scholarship Program Selection Step II

The JJ/WBGSP Secretariat will take into consideration the average score given by two assessors and the following criteria to select the finalists:

  • Maintaining a wide geographical distribution of awards
  • Maintaining distribution of awards across gender
  • Offering scholarships to applicants who are in need of financial aid to study abroad.
  • Unusual conditions, when judging employment experience and other aspects of an application.

Recipients of the scholarship will be informed only after the approval of the JJWBG Steering Committee. This will take place around mid-July 2023.

Successful applicants will be asked to submit a copy of passport for identification and health certificate (21 days after the scholarship has been granted)

grant_details.description: The Joint Japan/World Bank Graduate Scholarship Program encouraged applicants from developing countries to apply for the scholarship. The preferred and partner masters program can be undertaken atuniversities in USA,Africa, Japan, etc.The Joint Japan/World Bank Graduate Scholarship Program provides the recipients with the following benefits:Tuition feesA monthly living stipendHealth insuranceRound-trip airfare500 USD for travel allowanceTheJoint Japan/World Bank Graduate Scholarship ProgramwillNOTcover the following expenses:VISA application(s) costsAccommodation Expenses for scholar's family membersExtra-curricular courses or trainingLanguage training will not be provided.Additional travel expenses.Resident permit feeExpenses related to any kind of research work done.The application process for the scholarship started in January and ended on May 26, 2023. For more updates, candidates are advised to visit the official website.
grant_details.html_content:
The Joint Japan/World Bank Graduate Scholarship Program encouraged applicants from developing countries to apply for the scholarship. The preferred and partner masters program can be undertaken at universities in USA, Africa, Japan, etc.

The Joint Japan/World Bank Graduate Scholarship Program provides the recipients with the following benefits:

  • Tuition fees
  • A monthly living stipend
  • Health insurance
  • Round-trip airfare
  • 500 USD for travel allowance

The Joint Japan/World Bank Graduate Scholarship Program will NOT cover the following expenses:

  • VISA application(s) costs
  • Accommodation Expenses for scholar's family members
  • Extra-curricular courses or training
  • Language training will not be provided.
  • Additional travel expenses.
  • Resident permit fee
  • Expenses related to any kind of research work done.

The application process for the scholarship started in January and ended on May 26, 2023. For more updates, candidates are advised to visit the official website.

scholarship_name: Innovation in Education Scholarship - La Tutors 123
description:
The Innovation in Education Scholarship is awarded by the LA Tutors 123, which is a test-preparation, academic consultation and private-tutoring company in Los Angeles, U.S.

The company provides the scholarship to students who demonstrate creative, artistic and innovative abilities that help the society. The scholarship is meant for students who actively work toward the betterment of society and their work or project has helped in the improvement of society and people in the past.

Innovation in Education Scholarship provides 12 scholarships annually,1 month each to the deserving student. An eligible candidate must be a citizen, permanent resident or a valid student visa holder in the United States or Canada.

The award fund provided by the LA Tutors 123 for Innovation in Education Scholarship can be used by the student to pay off school-related expenses like tuition, fees, books, room, and board, etc

Some significant benefits of this scholarship are:

Details  Benefits 
Award amount  500 USD
Award duration  1 month 
Applicable program  All program at school, college or university

An important feature of the scholarship is that it is available to both international and domestic students, whether or not they are part of the company. The winning applicant will be given a one-time scholarship of 500 USD.

The completed application must be submitted on the 20th of the particular month in which the student wishes to participate.

eligibility_criteria.description: Eligible candidates should be outstanding students who have made a difference in the lives of others in some innovative or technological fashion.The students can apply even if they do not take services from the LA Tutors 123. Other Eligibility criteria that student must fulfill to gain benefits ofInnovation in Education Scholarshipare:Applicant must be currently enrolled as high school or college or a university as a student situated in the U.S. or Canada.The applicant must have a cumulative GPA of at least 3.0 or its equivalent.The innovative creation of the Applicant must be involved in any kind of innovation creation whether it is a website, blog posts, an app, or anything similarThe essay provided by the applicant must accurately describe the goal of the project.The applicant’s essay, idea or creation must be original.Immediate family members of La Tutors staff are not eligible for the scholarship.The applicant must apply before 11:59 pm PST on the 20th of every month.
eligibility_criteria.html_content:
Eligible candidates should be outstanding students who have made a difference in the lives of others in some innovative or technological fashion.

The students can apply even if they do not take services from the LA Tutors 123. Other Eligibility criteria that student must fulfill to gain benefits of Innovation in Education Scholarship are:

  • Applicant must be currently enrolled as high school or college or a university as a student situated in the U.S. or Canada.
  • The applicant must have a cumulative GPA of at least 3.0 or its equivalent.
  • The innovative creation of the Applicant must be involved in any kind of innovation creation whether it is a website, blog posts, an app, or anything similar
  • The essay provided by the applicant must accurately describe the goal of the project.
  • The applicant’s essay, idea or creation must be original.
  • Immediate family members of La Tutors staff are not eligible for the scholarship.

The applicant must apply before 11:59 pm PST on the 20th of every month.

application_process.description: The applicant must meet the eligibility criteria for the scholarship. He/she can then proceed to fill the application form forInnovation in Education Scholarshipprovided on the official website of LA TUTORS 123.The applicant is required to provide his/her personal information like name, email address, phone number, and high school/college name.An applicant is required to submit the following documents :Essay: Theessay should bepersonalized, indicate the goal of the project and its future prospective. Also, applicants must provide the link of the content if it is a blog or an app.Letter Of Recommendation: It must evaluate the quality of the project.Photograph of applicant: It should be taken during project execution and should be in JPG, PNG, GIF, TIFF format only.One must upload all the files at once by clicking on the ‘Upload Scholarship Documents’ button. The completed application must be submitted on the20th of the particular monthin which the student wishes to participate.
application_process.html_content:
The applicant must meet the eligibility criteria for the scholarship. He/she can then proceed to fill the application form for Innovation in Education Scholarship provided on the official website of LA TUTORS 123.

The applicant is required to provide his/her personal information like name, email address, phone number, and high school/college name.

An applicant is required to submit the following documents :

  • Essay: The essay should be personalized, indicate the goal of the project and its future prospective. Also, applicants must provide the link of the content if it is a blog or an app.
  • Letter Of Recommendation: It must evaluate the quality of the project.
  • Photograph of applicant: It should be taken during project execution and should be in JPG, PNG, GIF, TIFF format only.

One must upload all the files at once by clicking on the ‘Upload Scholarship Documents’ button. The completed application must be submitted on the 20th of the particular month in which the student wishes to participate.

selection_process.description: The selection processfor Innovation in Education Scholarshipinvolves evaluation on the grounds of creativity, innovation and user experience of the project. As the project is supposed to be a product of the imagination and technical skills of the applicant.All the applications will be checked, assessed and reviewed by apanel of three judges, after the 20th of each month.The judgment will be based on certain aspects like how well the project solves the problem, how the applicant presents his/her point of view, how the project strives to cultivate outcomes that are original and future-oriented.All submissions must be uploaded no later than 11:59 pm PST on the20th of each month.The submission window will remain closed after the 20th of every month and reopen on the 1st of next month at 8:00 a.m.Scholarship winners will be contacted via email by LA TUTORS 123 and must respond within five days of the date of the email to accept the award. If no response is received within a given time, another recipient will be selected for the scholarship.
selection_process.html_content:
The selection process for Innovation in Education Scholarship involves evaluation on the grounds of creativity, innovation and user experience of the project. As the project is supposed to be a product of the imagination and technical skills of the applicant.

All the applications will be checked, assessed and reviewed by a panel of three judges, after the 20th of each month.

The judgment will be based on certain aspects like how well the project solves the problem, how the applicant presents his/her point of view, how the project strives to cultivate outcomes that are original and future-oriented.

All submissions must be uploaded no later than 11:59 pm PST on the 20th of each month.

The submission window will remain closed after the 20th of every month and reopen on the 1st of next month at 8:00 a.m.

Scholarship winners will be contacted via email by LA TUTORS 123 and must respond within five days of the date of the email to accept the award. If no response is received within a given time, another recipient will be selected for the scholarship.

grant_details.description: The company has the right to pass on the scholarship award to the next deserving candidate if no response is received within the given time period of five days.LA TUTORS also reserves the right to feature photographs of winners of the scholarship. The successful applicant will receive the award amount of500 USDthrough the mail. LA TUTORS 123 offers12 scholarships in a year,one every month to the most innovative student.Recipient of Innovation in Education Scholarshipcan use the awardamount for payment of tuition fee school-related expenses like tuition fees, books, accommodation, etc.The scholarship commends all those creative students who have developed or designed a project incredible enough to gain the award that would help them to minimize their financial burden to a certain extent.The company’s main aim to establish the scholarship was to spark the creative genius in students and encourage them to create or make a difference in the lives of people through their innovative and technical skillset.
grant_details.html_content:
The company has the right to pass on the scholarship award to the next deserving candidate if no response is received within the given time period of five days.

LA TUTORS also reserves the right to feature photographs of winners of the scholarship. The successful applicant will receive the award amount of 500 USD through the mail. LA TUTORS 123 offers 12 scholarships in a year, one every month to the most innovative student.

Recipient of Innovation in Education Scholarship can use the award amount for payment of tuition fee school-related expenses like tuition fees, books, accommodation, etc.

The scholarship commends all those creative students who have developed or designed a project incredible enough to gain the award that would help them to minimize their financial burden to a certain extent.

The company’s main aim to establish the scholarship was to spark the creative genius in students and encourage them to create or make a difference in the lives of people through their innovative and technical skillset.

description:
QS Leadership Scholarship is offered to students who are planning to pursue their master’s degree at one of the partner institutions of QS. It is one of the awards offered under the QS Scholarship.

Applicants can apply for  QS leadership Scholarship only after accepting an admission offer for a degree program, in order to pay their tuition fee.

eligibility_criteria.description: Students have to qualify for the respectiveexams to study abroadas it comes under the eligibility criteria for admissions in various institutes. In addition to that, they must meet the eligibility requirements of QS Leadership Scholarship listed below:Must have attended any of the following QS events:World Grad School TourWorld MBA TourConnect a Masters or Connect MBA.Essay submission is required.Note:If the applicant doesn`t meet the above eligibility criteria, QS has the right to exclude from the selection process.
eligibility_criteria.html_content:
Students have to qualify for the respective exams to study abroad as it comes under the eligibility criteria for admissions in various institutes. In addition to that, they must meet the eligibility requirements of QS Leadership Scholarship listed below:

  • Must have attended any of the following QS events:
    •  World Grad School Tour
    • World MBA Tour
    • Connect a Masters or Connect MBA.
  • Essay submission is required.

Note: If the applicant doesn`t meet the above eligibility criteria, QS has the right to exclude from the selection process.

application_process.description: Students may apply for QS Leadership Scholarships through QS Events mobile phone apps or by visiting the official website of QS.To apply for the QS Leadership Scholarship, students have to write anessayof 500 words about their "most important leadership or innovation achievement which made a difference for their community or work".Students must also submit the required academic and extracurricular activities documents, specifically, impactful leadership highlights of one's career.The deadline for the QS Leadership Scholarship isMay 31, 2026.
application_process.html_content:
Students may apply for QS Leadership Scholarships through QS Events mobile phone apps or by visiting the official website of QS.

To apply for the QS Leadership Scholarship, students have to write an essay of 500 words about their "most important leadership or innovation achievement which made a difference for their community or work".

Students must also submit the required academic and extracurricular activities documents, specifically, impactful leadership highlights of one's career.

The deadline for the QS Leadership Scholarship is May 31, 2026.

selection_process.description: The selection process of theQS Leadership Scholarshipis based on the merit and social leadership achievements of a student.The student will also be evaluated on the500 words essaysubmitted during application.20% weightage is given to the format of the application essay80% weightage will be given the relevance of the content.Students have to mention their Full Name, Scholarship Title and the QS Event attended in the essay.The recipient will be contacted by the QS scholarship team within 2-3 weeks after the deadline. The finalist will be interviewed by the Q.S team and it may be published on their website.
selection_process.html_content:
The selection process of the QS Leadership Scholarship is based on the merit and social leadership achievements of a student.

The student will also be evaluated on the 500 words essay submitted during application.

  • 20% weightage is given to the format of the application essay
  • 80% weightage will be given the relevance of the content.

Students have to mention their Full Name, Scholarship Title and the QS Event attended in the essay.

The recipient will be contacted by the QS scholarship team within 2-3 weeks after the deadline. The finalist will be interviewed by the Q.S team and it may be published on their website.

grant_details.description: Through the QS scholarship scheme, students can study intop colleges in the UK,USA and any country of their choice covered under the scholarship scheme.QS Leadership Scholarship is one such award that offers masters students, with an award amount of 10, 000 USD.The scholarship amount will be directly sent to the college where a student has been admitted.Interested students must apply by May 31, 2026, to be considered for the same.Other Scholarships offered by QS are QS Leadership Scholarship for MBA, QS Connect Masters Scholarship Masters, QS Undergraduate Scholarship for Bachelor etc.
grant_details.html_content:
Through the QS scholarship scheme, students can study in top colleges in the UK, USA and any country of their choice covered under the scholarship scheme.

QS Leadership Scholarship is one such award that offers masters students, with an award amount of 10, 000 USD.

  • The scholarship amount will be directly sent to the college where a student has been admitted.
  • Interested students must apply by May 31, 2026, to be considered for the same.

Other Scholarships offered by QS are QS Leadership Scholarship for MBA, QS Connect Masters Scholarship Masters, QS Undergraduate Scholarship for Bachelor etc.

scholarship_name: Sandford Fleming Foundation Award for Academic Excellence
description:
University of Waterloo’s Sandford Fleming Foundation Award for Academic Excellence is offered to domestic and international students pursuing the Engineering UG degree course at the university. The scholarship reward is distributed by the Sandford Fleming Foundation which encourages students to pursue higher education in Canada.

Sandford Fleming Foundation Award for Academic Excellence is specifically designed for UG students studying Engineering courses at the University of Waterloo. Annually, 15 scholarships are given to meritorious students from each stream of engineering. The distribution of awards is based on the scholastic records of the applicants in the last six academic terms of their undergraduate program.

The table below highlights the type of expense student has to incur to study at the University of Waterloo and whether or not it is covered under the benefits of the Sandford Fleming Foundation Award for Academic Excellence :

Type of expense  Covered or not 
Tuition fee  Yes 
Accommodation  No
Books and supplies  No
International Fare  No
Monthly Stipend  No

The Sanford Fleming Foundation, a charitable association encourage and motivate students to perform well while pursuing an engineering degree at the University of Waterloo.

eligibility_criteria.description: In order to enjoy the benefits of the Sandford Fleming Foundation Award for Academic Excellence Scholarship, Applicants have to fulfill certain eligibility criteriaOne must be an engineering studentOne must be a student at theUniversity of Waterloo in CanadaOne must be a fourth-year studentNo other eligibility criteria as such are required. After applying for this award, the students will be automatically considered by the organization on a merit basis.
eligibility_criteria.html_content:
In order to enjoy the benefits of the Sandford Fleming Foundation Award for Academic Excellence Scholarship, Applicants have to fulfill certain eligibility criteria

  • One must be an engineering student
  • One must be a student at the University of Waterloo in Canada
  • One must be a fourth-year student

No other eligibility criteria as such are required. After applying for this award, the students will be automatically considered by the organization on a merit basis.

application_process.description: TheSandford Fleming Foundation Award for Academic Excellenceis applicable to the students pursuing an engineering degree inthe UGprogram at the University of Waterloo.There is no application process to be followed. Once a student takes a particular program under engineering, the faculty Engineering at the university will automatically consider him/her for the award on a past merit record basis.Eligible Undergraduate ProgramBiomedical EngineeringCivil EngineeringGeological EngineeringSoftware EngineeringElectrical EngineeringNanotechnology EngineeringSystem Design EngineeringMechanical EngineeringChemical EngineeringComputer EngineeringManagement SciencesStudents need not fill any application form separately to win the scholarship. They have to perform excellently well throughout the program to win this scholarship in the fourth year of the engineering program.
application_process.html_content:
The Sandford Fleming Foundation Award for Academic Excellence is applicable to the students pursuing an engineering degree in the UG program at the University of Waterloo. There is no application process to be followed. Once a student takes a particular program under engineering, the faculty Engineering at the university will automatically consider him/her for the award on a past merit record basis.

Eligible Undergraduate Program

  • Biomedical Engineering
  • Civil Engineering
  • Geological Engineering
  • Software Engineering
  • Electrical Engineering
  • Nanotechnology Engineering
  • System Design Engineering
  • Mechanical Engineering
  • Chemical Engineering
  • Computer Engineering
  • Management Sciences

Students need not fill any application form separately to win the scholarship. They have to perform excellently well throughout the program to win this scholarship in the fourth year of the engineering program.

selection_process.description: Sandford Fleming Foundation Award for Academic Excellencespeaks for itself. The selection process is based on the academic excellence of the students. Irrespective of their nationality, the students pursuing programs under engineering are considered for this award.The selection process does not require any additional forms or formalities. However, the student must have the best record in thepreceding 6 terms of their undergraduate program.The faculty or the department will automatically analyze the record and award the student with the SFF award for academic excellence.
selection_process.html_content:
Sandford Fleming Foundation Award for Academic Excellence speaks for itself. The selection process is based on the academic excellence of the students. Irrespective of their nationality, the students pursuing programs under engineering are considered for this award.

The selection process does not require any additional forms or formalities. However, the student must have the best record in the preceding 6 terms of their undergraduate program. The faculty or the department will automatically analyze the record and award the student with the SFF award for academic excellence.

grant_details.description: The SFF award for academic excellence is one of the simplest means of achieving an award on merit basis. It is only applicable to the studentsadmitted to the University of Waterloopursuing a specific program under engineering.Only 15 scholarshipsare awarded to students who showcase their best of abilities in the field of academics. This award has a wide reach coveringboth citizens and international studentsfrom various countries like India, the USA, Spain, Russia, Bangladesh, Turkey, Indonesia, etc.Sandford Fleming Foundation Award for Academic Excellence onlycovers the tuition fee of the fourth year program of the students.The scholarship does not cover thecost of living in Canadaat the University of Waterloo.To be eligible, one is supposed to be a fourth-year student doing one of the engineering programs at the University of Waterloo and must hold past academic excellence records. The faculty of the university then automatically takes into accounts the students who they find eligible and accordingly rewards them.Students who wish tostudy in Canadaat the University of Waterloo may visit its official website for any information.
grant_details.html_content:
The SFF award for academic excellence is one of the simplest means of achieving an award on merit basis. It is only applicable to the students admitted to the University of Waterloo pursuing a specific program under engineering. Only 15 scholarships are awarded to students who showcase their best of abilities in the field of academics. This award has a wide reach covering both citizens and international students from various countries like India, the USA, Spain, Russia, Bangladesh, Turkey, Indonesia, etc.

Sandford Fleming Foundation Award for Academic Excellence only covers the tuition fee of the fourth year program of the students. The scholarship does not cover the cost of living in Canada at the University of Waterloo.

To be eligible, one is supposed to be a fourth-year student doing one of the engineering programs at the University of Waterloo and must hold past academic excellence records. The faculty of the university then automatically takes into accounts the students who they find eligible and accordingly rewards them.

Students who wish to study in Canada at the University of Waterloo may visit its official website for any information.

description:
QS offers a wide range of scholarships to international students who wish to study abroad. QS Connect Master’s Scholarship is one such QS scholarship designed for students who will commence a master-level program at QS partnered university.

QS Connect Master’s Scholarship is applicable to the fields of LAW, STEM (Science, Technology, Engineering, and Management) and FAME (Finance, Accountancy, Mathematics, and Economics). Students pursuing their master’s degrees in the universities of the USA, Canada, Australia, the UK, and other countries are eligible to apply for the scholarship.

The scholarship, worth 2000 USD is awarded every year exclusively to one student who takes part in the Connect Masters Scheme. The scheme allows prospective postgraduates to meet face-to-face with university representatives from around the world in order to professionally discuss their next steps for their career and studies.

The latest deadline is yet to be announced.

eligibility_criteria.description: To enjoy the benefits QS Connect Master’s Scholarship, candidates have to fulfill the eligibility criteria given below :Accepting admission offer from a school by the time QS selects the winner in May.The scholarship reward amount must be used for tuition fees only.Must attend a QS Connect Masters event.Study at a master’s (non MBA) levelNote:QS reserves the full right to exclude applicants from the selection process if they don’t meet the eligibility criteria.
eligibility_criteria.html_content:
To enjoy the benefits QS Connect Master’s Scholarship, candidates have to fulfill the eligibility criteria given below :

  1. Accepting admission offer from a school by the time QS selects the winner in May.
  2. The scholarship reward amount must be used for tuition fees only.
  3. Must attend a QS Connect Masters event.
  4. Study at a master’s (non MBA) level

Note: QS reserves the full right to exclude applicants from the selection process if they don’t meet the eligibility criteria.

application_process.description: The application process for QS Connect Master’s Scholarship involves the submission of an essay.Applicants have to write an essay in about250 wordson the topic mentioned on the official website of the QS program and upload it on the portal of the QS Scholarship.The Topic for the year 2020 as given on the website is :The topic is “Considering your long-term objectives and ambitions, how will your master’s degree prepares you for your future career?”The submission of the essay plays a crucial role in the selection process for the scholarship. Here are some key points which should be kept in mind while writing an essay:Candidates mustread the essay statementcarefully and identify the key terms.Candidates must understand themeaning of the key themesand what these ideas mean and explore the ideas well with their experiences in the essay.Candidates should try to fill their scholarship essays with keywords used in the scholarship statement. This willdemonstrate their commitment to addressing the questionbeing asked.Candidates should try to makean engaging start to the essay.They can, for instance,add a quote that relates to their intended PG courseand later elaborate that quote further in the main body.One should try to understand the criteria used by the scholarship committee to evaluate the application essays. This further helps one toframe the article in technical aspects.The criteria are usually based on the topic given and the keywords. The committee will evaluate the essay onhow well the skills are presented combined with the themes.How to Submit QS Connect Master’s Scholarship EssayThe candidate should indicate theirFull name,Scholarship title, andthe QS fair which he/she has attended(example: QS Connect Masters-London-March 2019) at the beginning of the essay.These words are not included in the total word limit.The latest deadline is yet to be announced.
application_process.html_content:
The application process for QS Connect Master’s Scholarship involves the submission of an essay.

Applicants have to write an essay in about 250 words on the topic mentioned on the official website of the QS program and upload it on the portal of the QS Scholarship.

The Topic for the year 2020 as given on the website is :

The topic is “Considering your long-term objectives and ambitions, how will your master’s degree prepares you for your future career?”

The submission of the essay plays a crucial role in the selection process for the scholarship. Here are some key points which should be kept in mind while writing an essay:

  • Candidates must read the essay statement carefully and identify the key terms.
  • Candidates must understand the meaning of the key themes and what these ideas mean and explore the ideas well with their experiences in the essay.
  • Candidates should try to fill their scholarship essays with keywords used in the scholarship statement. This will demonstrate their commitment to addressing the question being asked.
  • Candidates should try to make an engaging start to the essay.
  • They can, for instance, add a quote that relates to their intended PG course and later elaborate that quote further in the main body.
  • One should try to understand the criteria used by the scholarship committee to evaluate the application essays. This further helps one to frame the article in technical aspects.
  • The criteria are usually based on the topic given and the keywords. The committee will evaluate the essay on how well the skills are presented combined with the themes.

How to Submit QS Connect Master’s Scholarship Essay

The candidate should indicate their

  • Full name,
  • Scholarship title, and
  • the QS fair which he/she has attended

(example: QS Connect Masters-London-March 2019) at the beginning of the essay. These words are not included in the total word limit.

The latest deadline is yet to be announced.

selection_process.description: The selection process for QS Connect Master’s Scholarship involves the evaluation of an applicant’s profile along with an essay submitted by them.Applicants may be further evaluated on the basis of other documents submitted by them. This includes :TranscriptCV or ResumeLetters of RecommendationThe submission of the essay is a crucial part of the selection process. Applicants should be more personal while writing an essay. They can include relevant details of past and present experiences, future goals and interests of an applicant in a particular area. The use of effective language will enhance the quality of the content.Academic excellence, overall presentation, the format of the essay and quality of content will decide thewinner of the QS Connect Master’s Scholarship.
selection_process.html_content:
The selection process for QS Connect Master’s Scholarship involves the evaluation of an applicant’s profile along with an essay submitted by them.

Applicants may be further evaluated on the basis of other documents submitted by them. This includes :

  • Transcript
  • CV or Resume
  • Letters of Recommendation

The submission of the essay is a crucial part of the selection process. Applicants should be more personal while writing an essay. They can include relevant details of past and present experiences, future goals and interests of an applicant in a particular area. The use of effective language will enhance the quality of the content.

Academic excellence, overall presentation, the format of the essay and quality of content will decide the winner of the QS Connect Master’s Scholarship.

grant_details.html_content:
QS Connect Master’s Scholarship offers a grant of 2,000 USD to the deserving candidate. The scholarship is highly competitive, it is advised to the applicants to prepare hard and write an essay nicely, showcasing the best of their abilities.

Identification of correct themes is necessary and elaborating and connecting them with own experience is important to do. This will only increase a candidate’s chance for the scholarship as a vague essay gets easily rejected. So, complete the application, upload the essay and wait for the fortune!

QS Scholarship scheme offers many other scholarships for students who want to pursue higher education with some financial aid.

The details for other scholarship provided by QS are given below :
