Students are advised to visit the official website of the QS scholarship to know the details regarding other scholarships.

The latest deadline is yet to be announced.

description:
Dr. Phillip Donaldson Memorial scholarship is offered by Central Queensland University (CQUniversity) in Australia. The scholarship recognizes and provides financial assistance to the deserving student residing in Bundaberg. The scholarship applies to domestic as well as international students who want to study abroad.

Dr. Phillip Donaldson Memorial scholarship is given only to one student pursuing a UG degree in any field at Central Queensland University in Australia.

Students have to fill the application form online for the scholarship. Applications will be evaluated largely on written submission of 500 words while selecting the winner of the scholarship. Written Submission should include career goals, educational objectives and personal experiences of an applicant.

The scholarship amount is 5,000 AUD which is given once a year. The scholarship grant covers only the tuition fee of the student.

The table below highlights the type of expense student has to incur to study at Central Queensland University and whether or not it is covered under the benefits of the Dr. Phillip Donaldson Memorial scholarship :

Type of Expense  Covered or not 
Tuition fee  Yes 
Accommodation  No
Books and supplies  No
International Fare  No
Monthly Stipend  No

After submitting the application form for the scholarship, applicants have to check their emails regularly for further updates.

The latest deadline is yet to be announced.

eligibility_criteria.description: To be considered for Dr. Phillip Donaldson Memorial Scholarship, applicants must be commencing aUG-level program at CQUniversity. In addition to this, they must provide a residential address of Bundaberg.On-going Eligibility for Dr. Phillip Donaldson Memorial ScholarshipStudents who are already studying at QC University can also apply for the scholarship. They should:Maintain a minimum GPA of 4.0 each termRemain enrolled in the courses at the census date of each term.
eligibility_criteria.html_content:
To be considered for Dr. Phillip Donaldson Memorial Scholarship, applicants must be commencing a UG-level program at CQUniversity. In addition to this, they must provide a residential address of Bundaberg.

On-going Eligibility for Dr. Phillip Donaldson Memorial Scholarship

Students who are already studying at QC University can also apply for the scholarship. They should:

  • Maintain a minimum GPA of 4.0 each term
  • Remain enrolled in the courses at the census date of each term.

application_process.description: Applicants have to apply online to secure the benefits of Dr. Phillip Donaldson Memorial scholarship. They have to complete the scholarship form available on the official website of the university.Current students who have Student ID numbers can apply through MyCentre by logging with their student’s details.Students who want to pursue their UG degree at CQ university must meet theadmission requirement at CQUniversityand then apply for the scholarship on the official website.Application form should be supported by required documents listed below :Written submission of 500 wordsOfficial TranscriptsProof of Community involvement, exemplary work, and leadership skills.ResumeIf applicants fail to submit the required documents, it will result in incomplete applications that will be automatically rejected.The latest deadline is yet to be announced.
application_process.html_content:
Applicants have to apply online to secure the benefits of Dr. Phillip Donaldson Memorial scholarship. They have to complete the scholarship form available on the official website of the university.

Current students who have Student ID numbers can apply through MyCentre by logging with their student’s details.

Students who want to pursue their UG degree at CQ university must meet the admission requirement at CQUniversity and then apply for the scholarship on the official website.

Application form should be supported by required documents listed below :

  • Written submission of 500 words
  • Official Transcripts
  • Proof of Community involvement, exemplary work, and leadership skills.
  • Resume

If applicants fail to submit the required documents, it will result in incomplete applications that will be automatically rejected.

The latest deadline is yet to be announced.

selection_process.description: A selection panel consisting of representatives from CQ University is formed to determine the successful applicant for the scholarship. Dr. Phillip Donaldson Memorial scholarship will only be offered to a student who will meet adequate merit.Applicants will be assessed on the application form and awritten submission of 500 words. The scholarship is largely based on written submission so take time to tell one’s unique story. Students should keep in mind certain points while writing the submission :Applicants should state their career goals and how the scholarship will assist them in achieving educational objectives.Submission should highlight the applicant’s best examples of community involvement, extracurricular activities, leadership skills, and other qualities.Give write-up a personal touch, include relevant life experiences and how they helped you in becoming a better person.Be sure to compile your submission in the template which looks clean and professional.Make sure you use correct words and avoid any grammatical errors to enhance the quality of content.All applicants will be informed about the results of their applications after the successful evaluation done by the selection panel. Dr. Phillip Donaldson Memorial scholarship amount will be transferred to the successful applicant’s nominated bank account in Week 6 of Term 1 and Term 2.
selection_process.html_content:
A selection panel consisting of representatives from CQ University is formed to determine the successful applicant for the scholarship. Dr. Phillip Donaldson Memorial scholarship will only be offered to a student who will meet adequate merit.

Applicants will be assessed on the application form and a written submission of 500 words. The scholarship is largely based on written submission so take time to tell one’s unique story. Students should keep in mind certain points while writing the submission :

  • Applicants should state their career goals and how the scholarship will assist them in achieving educational objectives.
  • Submission should highlight the applicant’s best examples of community involvement, extracurricular activities, leadership skills, and other qualities.
  • Give write-up a personal touch, include relevant life experiences and how they helped you in becoming a better person.
  • Be sure to compile your submission in the template which looks clean and professional.
  • Make sure you use correct words and avoid any grammatical errors to enhance the quality of content.

All applicants will be informed about the results of their applications after the successful evaluation done by the selection panel. Dr. Phillip Donaldson Memorial scholarship amount will be transferred to the successful applicant’s nominated bank account in Week 6 of Term 1 and Term 2.

grant_details.description: Dr. Phillip Donaldson Memorial scholarship is given in honor of Dr. Donaldson's life and achievements. It recognizes his contribution as an inspiring teacher and gifted researcher to the development of CQUniversity and the Bundaberg region.Under, Dr. Phillip Donaldson Memorial scholarship, the only scholarship is provided each year to one student that amounts to3429 USD that can be used to pay off tuition fees.Applications for the scholarship will be judged onwritten submission of 500 words. Applicants are advised to take time while writing submission and avoid any grammatical mistakes.The scholarship amount will be transferred to the successful applicant’s nominated bank account in Week 6 of Term 1 and Term 2.The latest deadline is yet to be announced.Students who are planning tostudy in Austaliaat CQ university are advised to visit their official website for any information.
grant_details.html_content:
Dr. Phillip Donaldson Memorial scholarship is given in honor of Dr. Donaldson's life and achievements. It recognizes his contribution as an inspiring teacher and gifted researcher to the development of CQUniversity and the Bundaberg region.

Under, Dr. Phillip Donaldson Memorial scholarship, the only scholarship is provided each year to one student that amounts to 3429 USD that can be used to pay off tuition fees.

Applications for the scholarship will be judged on written submission of 500 words. Applicants are advised to take time while writing submission and avoid any grammatical mistakes.

The scholarship amount will be transferred to the successful applicant’s nominated bank account in Week 6 of Term 1 and Term 2.

The latest deadline is yet to be announced.

Students who are planning to study in Austalia at CQ university are advised to visit their official website for any information.

description: AAUW International Fellowship program is designed for international female students pursuing full-time research studies at U.S. universities. The fellowship applies to graduate, doctoral or postdoctoral programs at US universities.

eligibility_criteria.description: To secure the AAUW International Fellowships,applicants have to fulfill the criteria established by the foundation. The applicant must :Be an international student with aU.S student visa.Hold an academic bachelor’s degree from the U.S. or any globally recognized university.Commence a full-time program graduate or doctoral program at any chosen US institution.Hold an academic degree (earned in the U.S. or abroad) equivalent to a U.S. bachelor’s degree completed by November 15, 2022.Return to their home country to pursue a professional career.TOEFL or IELTS exam score to be submitted:TOEFL-PBT: 550TOEFL-iBT: 79IELTS: 6.5Note:Foreign branches of U.S. institutions are considered outside of the U.S.
eligibility_criteria.html_content:
To secure the AAUW International Fellowships, applicants have to fulfill the criteria established by the foundation. The applicant must :

  • Be an international student with a U.S student visa.
  • Hold an academic bachelor’s degree from the U.S. or any globally recognized university.
  • Commence a full-time program graduate or doctoral program at any chosen US institution.
  • Hold an academic degree (earned in the U.S. or abroad) equivalent to a U.S. bachelor’s degree completed by November 15, 2022.
  • Return to their home country to pursue a professional career.
  • TOEFL or IELTS exam score to be submitted:
    • TOEFL-PBT: 550
    • TOEFL-iBT: 79
    • IELTS: 6.5

Note: Foreign branches of U.S. institutions are considered outside of the U.S.

application_process.description: Applicants must complete the AAUW International Fellowships application and access the same from the foundation’s official website.The AAUW International Fellowships application form will comprise of the following components:Fulfilling the eligibility criteria.Applicant’s name as mentioned in the passportRecommendations:ThreeLORSfrom professors or professional colleaguesAlong with the form, applicants have to submit documents listed below:Academic Transcriptswith certified English translationProof of bachelor’s degree(postdoctoral applicants only)An official report ofTOEFLTest Scoreor the waiver request,Letter of Admission:The applicant will upload a letter of admission* from the proposed institution of study or researchResumeNote:AAUW does not accept references from dossier services. Recommendations must be uploaded along with the application form.
application_process.html_content:
Applicants must complete the AAUW International Fellowships application and access the same from the foundation’s official website.

The AAUW International Fellowships application form will comprise of the following components:

  • Fulfilling the eligibility criteria.
  • Applicant’s name as mentioned in the passport
  • Recommendations: Three LORS from professors or professional colleagues

Along with the form, applicants have to submit documents listed below:

  • Academic Transcripts with certified English translation
  • Proof of bachelor’s degree (postdoctoral applicants only)
  • An official report of TOEFL Test Score or the waiver request,
  • Letter of Admission: The applicant will upload a letter of admission* from the proposed institution of study or research
  • Resume

Note: AAUW does not accept references from dossier services. Recommendations must be uploaded along with the application form.

selection_process.description: The selection panel will review each application comprehensively. While selecting the recipients of AAUW International Fellowships, the selection committee evaluates the following detailsApplicants who are residing in their home country will receive special consideration.Intent to return to their home country after the degree awarded.Academic and/or professional qualifications.Test scores ofexam to study in the USA.Commitment to the advancement of women and girls in her home country is taken into evaluation.Quality and feasibility of the proposed plan of study or researchProvide proof of prior community and/or civic service in the home country.Financial need is considered.Demonstration of motivation for graduate study or research.Applicants should be from an underrepresented area of the country and/or type of university other than a top-level research institution.Note:Applications, supporting documents, recommendations, etc. become the sole property of AAUW and will neither be returned nor held for another year.
selection_process.html_content:
The selection panel will review each application comprehensively. While selecting the recipients of AAUW International Fellowships, the selection committee evaluates the following details

  • Applicants who are residing in their home country will receive special consideration.
  • Intent to return to their home country after the degree awarded.
  • Academic and/or professional qualifications.
    • Test scores of exam to study in the USA.
  • Commitment to the advancement of women and girls in her home country is taken into evaluation.
  • Quality and feasibility of the proposed plan of study or research
  • Provide proof of prior community and/or civic service in the home country.
  • Financial need is considered.
  • Demonstration of motivation for graduate study or research.
  • Applicants should be from an underrepresented area of the country and/or type of university other than a top-level research institution.

Note: Applications, supporting documents, recommendations, etc. become the sole property of AAUW and will neither be returned nor held for another year.

grant_details.description: AAUW International Fellowship program encourages female students to pursue master’s, doctoral and post-doctoral degrees atuniversities in the USA.Limited no. of awards are offered to the recipients of AAUW International Fellowships.Upto 5 masters’s/first professional degrees will be renewable for a second year.The award value for various degrees are mentioned in the following table:Degree/ Level of StudyAward AmountMaster’s/First Professional degree18,000 USDDoctoral Degree20,000 USDPostdoctoral Degree30,000 USDAAUW International Fellowships award can be used for educational expenses, living expenses, dependent child care, etc, Travel to professional meetings, conferences, or seminars as long as it does not exceed 10% of the fellowship.There are some exceptions to the stipend- some exceptions based on relevant tax treaties and statuses, the fellowship stipend is subject to a14 or 30 percent tax.AAUW International Fellowshipsdoes not cover:Purchase of equipmentIndirect costsResearch assistantsPrevious expenditures, deficits, or repayment of loansPublication costsInstitutional (overhead) costsTuition for dependent’s educationTravel to or from a fellow’s home countryTravel to or from the fellow’s research location, if abroad (does not apply to fellows who are GWI members with AAUW approval to study or research in a country other than their ownInterested women candidates can visit the official website of AAUW International Fellowships regarding further updates for fellowship programs.
grant_details.html_content:
AAUW International Fellowship program encourages female students to pursue master’s, doctoral and post-doctoral degrees at universities in the USA.

  • Limited no. of awards are offered to the recipients of AAUW International Fellowships.
  • Upto 5 masters’s/first professional degrees will be renewable for a second year.

The award value for various degrees are mentioned in the following table:

Degree/ Level of Study Award Amount 
Master’s/First Professional degree 18,000 USD 
Doctoral Degree 20,000 USD 
Postdoctoral Degree 30,000 USD 

AAUW International Fellowships award can be used for educational expenses, living expenses, dependent child care, etc, Travel to professional meetings, conferences, or seminars as long as it does not exceed 10% of the fellowship.

There are some exceptions to the stipend- some exceptions based on relevant tax treaties and statuses, the fellowship stipend is subject to a 14 or 30 percent tax. AAUW International Fellowships does not cover :

  • Purchase of equipment
  • Indirect costs
  • Research assistants
  • Previous expenditures, deficits, or repayment of loans
  • Publication costs
  • Institutional (overhead) costs
  • Tuition for dependent’s education
  • Travel to or from a fellow’s home country
  • Travel to or from the fellow’s research location, if abroad (does not apply to fellows who are GWI members with AAUW approval to study or research in a country other than their own

Interested women candidates can visit the official website of AAUW International Fellowships regarding further updates for fellowship programs.

scholarship_name: University of Adelaide Global Citizens Scholarship
description:
The University of Adelaide Global Citizens Scholarship is offered to international students commencing coursework programs at the institution. With a few subject area/ field restrictions, the scholarship is applicable for graduate and undergraduate programs at University of Adelaide.

Recipients must note that the University of Adelaide Global Citizens Scholarship payment will be made directly into a recipient’s tuition fees account for the duration of study.

eligibility_criteria.description: Since the University of Adelaide Global Citizens Scholarship is a merit-based program, the eligibility requirements are entirely based on the academic qualification of applicants in their previous level of education.Tuition fee waiverMinimum UG scholarship requirementMinimum PG scholarship requirement15%ATAR equivalent of 85GPA of 5.5/7.030%ATAR equivalent of 95GPA 6.5/7.0*Australian Tertiary Admissions RankSeveral programs are exempted from the Global Citizens Scholarship such asMBA,Graduate Diploma of Marine Engineering, Master of Viticulture and Oenology, Bachelor of Health and Medical Science, etc.
eligibility_criteria.html_content:
Since the University of Adelaide Global Citizens Scholarship is a merit-based program, the eligibility requirements are entirely based on the academic qualification of applicants in their previous level of education.

Tuition fee waiver Minimum UG scholarship requirement Minimum PG scholarship requirement
15% ATAR equivalent of 85 GPA of 5.5/7.0
30% ATAR equivalent of 95 GPA 6.5/7.0

*Australian Tertiary Admissions Rank

Several programs are exempted from the Global Citizens Scholarship such as MBA, Graduate Diploma of Marine Engineering, Master of Viticulture and Oenology, Bachelor of Health and Medical Science, etc.

application_process.description: No separate application is required for the University of Adelaide Global Citizens Scholarship. All the international students who have takenadmissions at the University of Adelaideare automatically considered for the program.Therefore, Global Citizens Scholarship application process is the same as the admission process, which isExplore the undergraduate/postgraduate program and verify its eligibility.Access the online application form on the university website or approach the university agent in your region.Submit the required student supporting documents:Exams taken to study in Australiasuch as TOEFL, IELTS, PTEAcademic transcripts and their certified English translationsPersonal essay and Letter(s) of recommendationResume highlighting work experience (if required)Applicants must note that they have to submit their admission application before time, else they will not be considered for the admission.
application_process.html_content:
No separate application is required for the University of Adelaide Global Citizens Scholarship. All the international students who have taken admissions at the University of Adelaide are automatically considered for the program. 

Therefore, Global Citizens Scholarship application process is the same as the admission process, which is

  • Explore the undergraduate/postgraduate program and verify its eligibility.
  • Access the online application form on the university website or approach the university agent in your region.
  • Submit the required student supporting documents:
    • Exams taken to study in Australia such as TOEFL, IELTS, PTE
    • Academic transcripts and their certified English translations
    • Personal essay and Letter(s) of recommendation
    • Resume highlighting work experience (if required)

Applicants must note that they have to submit their admission application before time, else they will not be considered for the admission.

selection_process.description: Students are shortlisted for the University of Adelaide Global Citizens Scholarship if they meet theminimum ATAR/GPA requirementat the time of admission. While the scholarships are majorly awarded on the basis of the academic merit, the selection committee may evaluate other factors during the shorlisting process. These includeChoice of undergraduate/postgraduate programEnglish proficiency test scoreLORs and personal essayAdditionally, students must have been admitted into the program before the closing deadline of the scholarship. Post the closing deadline, no other candidates will be considered.
selection_process.html_content:
Students are shortlisted for the University of Adelaide Global Citizens Scholarship if they meet the minimum ATAR/GPA requirement at the time of admission. While the scholarships are majorly awarded on the basis of the academic merit, the selection committee may evaluate other factors during the shorlisting process. These include

  • Choice of undergraduate/postgraduate program
  • English proficiency test score
  • LORs and personal essay

Additionally, students must have been admitted into the program before the closing deadline of the scholarship. Post the closing deadline, no other candidates will be considered.

grant_details.description: The University of Adelaide is one of thetop universities in Australiaoffering more then 200 undergraduate and graduate programs to international students. Once students have accepted their offer letters to study at the full-time program, they are considered automatically for the University of Adelaide Global Citizens  Scholarship.Candidates who are chosen to be a recipient of the scholarship will receive a tuition waiver for the entire program.Study lengthVariableScholarship amount15% or 30% reduction in tuition feeAward distributionAnnuallyApplicable programMajor programs excluding medical science and a few more programsIf the candidate has torepeat any year, they would have to pay the repeated year’s tuition themselves. Students also need to maintain their international student status to continue receiving their scholarship awards.The University of Adelaide can serve as one of the best universities in Australia and can be the most appropriate option to study in Australia as it provides a number of scholarships that help the students financially.
grant_details.html_content:
The University of Adelaide is one of the top universities in Australia offering more then 200 undergraduate and graduate programs to international students. Once students have accepted their offer letters to study at the full-time program, they are considered automatically for the University of Adelaide Global Citizens  Scholarship.

Candidates who are chosen to be a recipient of the scholarship will receive a tuition waiver for the entire program.

Study length Variable
Scholarship amount 15% or 30% reduction in tuition fee
Award distribution Annually
Applicable program Major programs excluding medical science and a few more programs

If the candidate has to repeat any year, they would have to pay the repeated year’s tuition themselves. Students also need to maintain their international student status to continue receiving their scholarship awards.

The University of Adelaide can serve as one of the best universities in Australia and can be the most appropriate option to study in Australia as it provides a number of scholarships that help the students financially.

description:
Go Clean Scholarship is awarded to ambitious and hardworking individuals who are pursuing a college education. This is completely a merit-based scholarship and is offered to students from all over the world.

This scholarship is applicable to both incoming and continuing students studying undergraduate, postgraduate, or Ph.D. degrees in the colleges of the United States, Australia, UK, Canada, and other countries.

eligibility_criteria.description: Applicants have to fulfill the eligibility criteria listed below for the Go Clean Scholarship:Studying or willing to study either undergraduate, postgraduate, or Ph.D. degrees at anyacademic institution abroad.Currently pursuing an undergraduate or graduate degree then he/she must have a minimum of 2.5 GPA.Applicants who are willing to participate need to register for an online essay contest and send their applications via email.This merit-based scholarship will be granted on the basis ofthe essaywritten on the topic provided by the organization.
eligibility_criteria.html_content:
Applicants have to fulfill the eligibility criteria listed below for the Go Clean Scholarship:

  • Studying or willing to study either undergraduate, postgraduate, or Ph.D. degrees at any academic institution abroad.
  • Currently pursuing an undergraduate or graduate degree then he/she must have a minimum of 2.5 GPA.
  • Applicants who are willing to participate need to register for an online essay contest and send their applications via email.

This merit-based scholarship will be granted on the basis of the essay written on the topic provided by the organization.

application_process.description: There is no need to separately apply for this scholarship. Applicants need to register themselves for an online essay contest.Applicants need to write an article on a topic provided by the organization in about 500 to 750 words in length.Topic:How to keep the environment green and clean?Applicants then should submit their article via email to scholarships@alltoiletmatters.com before 1stJanuary 2020 (Not updated yet).In addition, applicants will also have to submit their entries along with their details like:Applicant’s full name with their postal address.Name of the Current Institution along with the Address.Proof that the Candidate is currently enrolled in the institute which is the personal ID/Registration number of their Institutions.Note: The topic for last year was “How to Keep the World Green and Safe”. Applicants can take an idea from the topic and can prepare their article on similar lines.
application_process.html_content:
There is no need to separately apply for this scholarship. Applicants need to register themselves for an online essay contest.

  • Applicants need to write an article on a topic provided by the organization in about 500 to 750 words in length.
    • Topic: How to keep the environment green and clean?
  • Applicants then should submit their article via email to scholarships@alltoiletmatters.com before 1st January 2020 (Not updated yet).
  • In addition, applicants will also have to submit their entries along with their details like:
    • Applicant’s full name with their postal address.
    • Name of the Current Institution along with the Address.
    • Proof that the Candidate is currently enrolled in the institute which is the personal ID/Registration number of their Institutions.

Note: The topic for last year was “How to Keep the World Green and Safe”. Applicants can take an idea from the topic and can prepare their article on similar lines.

selection_process.description: This Go Clean Scholarship program is open to all the students who have currently enrolled in educational programs in any educational institute anywhere. Any student can apply for our scholarship program for receiving an award of 3500 USD.The judging committee will review all the applications and evaluate the essay submitted by the applicants and announce the winner by end of April 2021.Selected candidates will be contacted via email and shall their names also be published on the site.The scholarship amount of 3500 USD will be sent directly to the College/University/High School in the name of the winning candidate.The selected candidate for the Go Clean Scholarship award will be contacted via email through which the application was submitted, so it is very important for the applicant to have a working email address.Go Clean Scholarship a one-time grant. The scholarship award value will be directly sent to the scholar’s institute, college, and university. under their name.
selection_process.html_content:
This Go Clean Scholarship program is open to all the students who have currently enrolled in educational programs in any educational institute anywhere. Any student can apply for our scholarship program for receiving an award of 3500 USD.

  • The judging committee will review all the applications and evaluate the essay submitted by the applicants and announce the winner by end of April 2021.
  • Selected candidates will be contacted via email and shall their names also be published on the site.
  • The scholarship amount of 3500 USD will be sent directly to the College/University/High School in the name of the winning candidate.

The selected candidate for the Go Clean Scholarship award will be contacted via email through which the application was submitted, so it is very important for the applicant to have a working email address.

Go Clean Scholarship a one-time grant. The scholarship award value will be directly sent to the scholar’s institute, college, and university. under their name.

description:
Imperial College London offers 50 fully-funded awards in the form of President's PhD Scholarships to students who want to pursue research at the college. Students must enrol in Imperial College London’s doctoral programs to be eligible.

Selection is based on academic merit, potential, and personal statement, including the student’s research goals and interests.

It is reported by Imperial College London that financial aid for research programs is competitive. Students must concentrate on highlighting their academic performances and achievements to be selected.

eligibility_criteria.description: The scholarship invites applications from all students, irrespective of their nationality, who wish tostudy abroadat Imperial College London. In addition to that, they must meet other requirements specified for the scholarship.Candidates must be enrolled in one of the doctoralprograms at Imperial College LondonMust have afirst-classUK degree or its equivalent international degree.Must have a high rank in their UG and PG studies.The student with multiple master’s degrees, whose degree is relevant to their research studies, must have a distinction.Current registered Imperial PhD students arenoteligibleBefore applying to the scholarship, candidates must be in touch with a supervisor at the academic department at Imperial College who has agreed to supervise or mentor their research.Note:Supervisors are only allowed to take on one candidate at a time, and students must be aware of the available supervisors.
eligibility_criteria.html_content:
The scholarship invites applications from all students, irrespective of their nationality, who wish to study abroad at Imperial College London. In addition to that, they must meet other requirements specified for the scholarship.

  • Candidates must be enrolled in one of the doctoral programs at Imperial College London
  • Must have a first-class UK degree or its equivalent international degree.
  • Must have a high rank in their UG and PG studies.
  • The student with multiple master’s degrees, whose degree is relevant to their research studies, must have a distinction.
  • Current registered Imperial PhD students are not eligible

Before applying to the scholarship, candidates must be in touch with a supervisor at the academic department at Imperial College who has agreed to supervise or mentor their research.

Note: Supervisors are only allowed to take on one candidate at a time, and students must be aware of the available supervisors.

application_process.description: To be considered for thePresident's PhD Scholarships,the correct option must be selected during admission. The scheme must be selected from the funding option, which can be found under the additional questions tab.Applicants must have securedadmission at Imperial College of Londonto be eligible for the scholarship.The candidate’s department then forwards the student’s profile if theacademic track recordandpotentialmeet the scholarship’s eligibility criteria.Candidates will be asked to write apersonal statementin about 1000 words, and it should be 2 pages long.The statement outlines the candidate’s academic and research achievements to date, explaining, in brief, their planned research projectCorrections and updates to the personal statement can be made.Once the students meet all the requirements, they move on to the selection process.
application_process.html_content:
To be considered for the President's PhD Scholarships, the correct option must be selected during admission. The scheme must be selected from the funding option, which can be found under the additional questions tab.

Applicants must have secured admission at Imperial College of London to be eligible for the scholarship.

The candidate’s department then forwards the student’s profile if the academic track record and potential meet the scholarship’s eligibility criteria.

  • Candidates will be asked to write a personal statement in about 1000 words, and it should be 2 pages long.
  • The statement outlines the candidate’s academic and research achievements to date, explaining, in brief, their planned research project
  • Corrections and updates to the personal statement can be made.

Once the students meet all the requirements, they move on to the selection process.

selection_process.description: The shortlisted candidates will go through the two-step selection process to gain benefits from the President’s Ph.D. Scholarships.President's Ph.D.Ph.D. ScholarshipsSelection Step IAll students must meet the admission requirements of the department they have applied to.The department will shortlist the best candidate based on their profile to the scholarship panel for the next step in the process.President's PhD ScholarshipsSelection Step IIThe Imperial College’s Selection Panel will take the final decision regarding winners of the scholarship.The panel consists of theVice-Provost of Researchand theFaculty Vice-Deans for Research.All students who have been shortlisted will be judged on their potential and past performance.All candidates who have been shortlisted by their respective department will be evaluated on the following criteria:Academic performanceHigh achievers in the UG and master’s education level. Documents submitted during the admission process will also be considered. Students who have 85% or higher grades will be considered.Research potentialCandidates must have demonstrated the potential for research previously. They must provide proof of interest in the research plan, the discovery of research. Their personal statement must also reflect such a statement.SuitabilityThe candidate must have appropriate references to back up their applications. Their chosen supervisor must show support. The candidate’s interview performance will be considered.Recipientsof the scholarship will be informed by the Imperial College London through a written confirmation.Until the final interview is held and the qualifications yet to be received are submitted, the offer letter extended will be conditional.
selection_process.html_content:
The shortlisted candidates will go through the two-step selection process to gain benefits from the President’s Ph.D. Scholarships.

President's Ph.D.Ph.D. Scholarships Selection Step I

  • All students must meet the admission requirements of the department they have applied to.
  • The department will shortlist the best candidate based on their profile to the scholarship panel for the next step in the process.

President's PhD Scholarships Selection Step II

  • The Imperial College’s Selection Panel will take the final decision regarding winners of the scholarship.
  • The panel consists of the Vice-Provost of Research and the Faculty Vice-Deans for Research.
  • All students who have been shortlisted will be judged on their potential and past performance.

All candidates who have been shortlisted by their respective department will be evaluated on the following criteria:

Academic performance High achievers in the UG and master’s education level. Documents submitted during the admission process will also be considered. Students who have 85% or higher grades will be considered.
Research potential Candidates must have demonstrated the potential for research previously. They must provide proof of interest in the research plan, the discovery of research. Their personal statement must also reflect such a statement.
Suitability The candidate must have appropriate references to back up their applications. Their chosen supervisor must show support. The candidate’s interview performance will be considered.

Recipients of the scholarship will be informed by the Imperial College London through a written confirmation.

Until the final interview is held and the qualifications yet to be received are submitted, the offer letter extended will be conditional.

grant_details.description: Imperial College London providesfinancial support for international students in the UKin the form of President's PhD Scholarships. Students must enroll in any one of the doctoral programs offered by Imperial College London.A total of 50 scholarships are offered under this.Successful candidates will receive the following benefits for up to 3.5 years :Full funding for tuition feesA stipend of 25,980 GBP annually to assist with living costsA consumables fund of 2,000 GBP annually for the first 3 years of studyA program of bespoke opportunities and events delivered by the Graduate SchoolStudents who wish to study in the UK at Imperial College London are advised to visit its official site for any kind of information.
grant_details.html_content:
Imperial College London provides financial support for international students in the UK in the form of President's PhD Scholarships. Students must enroll in any one of the doctoral programs offered by Imperial College London.

A total of 50 scholarships are offered under this.

Successful candidates will receive the following benefits for up to 3.5 years :

  • Full funding for tuition fees
  • A stipend of 25,980 GBP annually to assist with living costs
  • A consumables fund of 2,000 GBP annually for the first 3 years of study
  • A program of bespoke opportunities and events delivered by the Graduate School

Students who wish to study in the UK at Imperial College London are advised to visit its official site for any kind of information.

description:
Brian Le Lievre Scholarship is an initiative taken at the University of Waterloo to recognized academically outstanding students pursuing higher studies at the university. Brian Le Lievre Scholarship is applicable for selected UG engineering programs at the University of Waterloo.

Instead of a separate application, the students enrolled in the specific courses will be automatically considered by the University of Waterloo.

The selection is based upon the academic achievement of the students at the University of Waterloo. Students must maintain a score of 80% on their recent results.

eligibility_criteria.description: To secure Brian Le Lievre Scholarship at the University of Waterloo, prospective applicants must fulfill the eligibility requirements listed below:Students must have completed 2 years any of the one UG courses offered by University of Waterloo:Architectural EngineeringCivil Engineering,Environmental EngineeringMust maintain an academic score of 80% to clarify for merit.
eligibility_criteria.html_content:
To secure Brian Le Lievre Scholarship at the University of Waterloo, prospective applicants must fulfill the eligibility requirements listed below:

  • Students must have completed 2 years any of the one UG courses offered by University of Waterloo:
    • Architectural Engineering
    • Civil Engineering,
    • Environmental Engineering
  • Must maintain an academic score of 80% to clarify for merit.

application_process.description: Students registered under thefaculty of engineering at the University of Waterlooand completed the second year of Civil, Architectural or Environmental Engineering will be are automatically considered.
application_process.html_content: Students registered under the faculty of engineering at the University of Waterloo and completed the second year of Civil, Architectural or Environmental Engineering will be are automatically considered.

selection_process.description: Brian Le Lievre Scholarship is merit-based. Selection will be based upon the applicant’s academic performance in the last 2 years of the UG study.Students scoring more than 80% in their campus aggregate will be given preference by the selection committee.
selection_process.html_content:
Brian Le Lievre Scholarship is merit-based. Selection will be based upon the applicant’s academic performance in the last 2 years of the UG study.

Students scoring more than 80% in their campus aggregate will be given preference by the selection committee.

grant_details.description: Students pursuing engineering programs in one of thetop universities in Canada,University of Waterloo can apply for Brian Le Lievre Scholarship.University will automatically consider the deserving candidates.Only two students will be selected.The monetary benefit offered via Brian Le Lievre Scholarship is 2500 CAD.It is aone-time scholarshipawarded at the beginning winter term.For any query related to this scholarship, students maycontact:Jessica Bruni, Undergraduate Awards Co-ordinatorjbruni@uwaterloo.caThe Centre, Needles Hall
grant_details.html_content:
Students pursuing engineering programs in one of the top universities in Canada, University of Waterloo can apply for Brian Le Lievre Scholarship.

  • University will automatically consider the deserving candidates.
  • Only two students will be selected.
  • The monetary benefit offered via Brian Le Lievre Scholarship is 2500 CAD.
  • It is a one-time scholarship awarded at the beginning winter term.

For any query related to this scholarship, students may contact:

Jessica Bruni, Undergraduate Awards Co-ordinator
jbruni@uwaterloo.ca
The Centre, Needles Hall

description:
Novus Biological Scholarship Program is offered by Novus Biologicals, LLC to the students who wanted to escalate their careers in science or any subject related to it. The scholarship amount can be used in advancing scientific research and development.

The scholarship is applicable for students pursuing UG, PG or Doctoral degrees in any stream related to science. Only applicants from the U.S, Canada, and European countries are eligible for the scholarship.

It is awarded to one student for fall, one student for spring semesters. Scholarship money given to the selected student is 1500 USD. Award selection will be based on a combination of the applicant's academic records and the strength of the personal statement.

The application deadline was on September 19, 2024 for Fall term.

eligibility_criteria.description: To secure the benefits of Novus Biological Scholarship Program, applicants must fulfill eligibility criteria given below :The applicants should be intended to pursue a major in Science related fields.Enrolled or accepted for enrolment of any degree from bachelor’s, master’s, associate degree, or a diploma.Applicants should be from the US, Canada, and European countries.No GPA required to be eligible for the scholarship
eligibility_criteria.html_content:
To secure the benefits of Novus Biological Scholarship Program, applicants must fulfill eligibility criteria given below :

  • The applicants should be intended to pursue a major in Science related fields.
  • Enrolled or accepted for enrolment of any degree from bachelor’s, master’s, associate degree, or a diploma.
  • Applicants should be from the US, Canada, and European countries.
  • No GPA required to be eligible for the scholarship

application_process.description: To apply for Novus Biological Scholarship Program, students must complete the application. The form consists of three parts: Applicants Information, Academic Information, and application material. The first two parts require general information about the applicant.The third part consists of write-upsApplicants have to list their extracurricular activities related to the field of study.Write a written statement of 500 words or less on why you chose this field of studyWrite a personal statement of 500 words or less on the impact you strive to make using a degree in your field of interest.Complete the application form and wait for the result. After the deadline ends, all the recipients will be contacted and notified via an email directly.
application_process.html_content:
To apply for Novus Biological Scholarship Program, students must complete the application. The form consists of three parts: Applicants Information, Academic Information, and application material. The first two parts require general information about the applicant.

The third part consists of write-ups

  • Applicants have to list their extracurricular activities related to the field of study.
  • Write a written statement of 500 words or less on why you chose this field of study
  • Write a personal statement of 500 words or less on the impact you strive to make using a degree in your field of interest.

Complete the application form and wait for the result. After the deadline ends, all the recipients will be contacted and notified via an email directly.

selection_process.description: After the successful submission of the application form, next comes the selection process. Applications forms for theNovus Biologicals Scholarship Programwill be evaluated on the basis of documents and essays submitted. The essay will be judged based on writing ability, career goals and individual interest in the field of science.All recipients will be contacted and notified after the successful evaluation of the application form.
selection_process.html_content:
After the successful submission of the application form, next comes the selection process. Applications forms for the Novus Biologicals Scholarship Program will be evaluated on the basis of documents and essays submitted. The essay will be judged based on writing ability, career goals and individual interest in the field of science.

All recipients will be contacted and notified after the successful evaluation of the application form.

grant_details.description: Novus Biologicals Scholarship Program offers the assistance of1500 USDto the deserving candidate. This scholarship is a big aid for all thescience aspirantswho want to pursue a degree in science and also wish to contribute to R & D in the field of science.The scholarship is giventwice a yearfor the fall and spring semester and the applicants are advised to apply for a suitable term.If applicants have any confusion about the scholarship programs, please contact atscholarship@bio-techne.com.
grant_details.html_content:
Novus Biologicals Scholarship Program offers the assistance of 1500 USD to the deserving candidate. This scholarship is a big aid for all the science aspirants who want to pursue a degree in science and also wish to contribute to R & D in the field of science.

The scholarship is given twice a year for the fall and spring semester and the applicants are advised to apply for a suitable term.

If applicants have any confusion about the scholarship programs, please contact at scholarship@bio-techne.com.

description:
1st Formations Business Scholarship is presented by 1st Formations, a leading UK company formation agent, to fund the next generation of entrepreneurs. This Scholarship provides additional funding to students who are studying UG and PG programs in recognised UK or US academic institutions.

It intends to provide additional funding to develop the skills required to become a future industry leader. The scholarship bursary amount of 750 USD is given to 5 students.

Recipients of the 1st Formations Business Scholarship can use the award amount for costs of studying, like a textbooks and other living expenses. Some significant benefits of this Scholarship are:

Details  Benefits
Award Amount  500 GBP ($750)
Award Duration  One year 
Applicable Programs  All UG programs at Universities in the U.K. and the U.S 

1st Formations Business Scholarship assists the budding entrepreneurs in accessing the education, skills, and knowledge required to run their own business in the future.

The deadline for 2025-26 applicants is 31st January 2026.

eligibility_criteria.description: 1st Formations Business Scholarship is open to students who are currently studying in UG and PG degrees inuniversities in the U.Sand the U.K.To secure the benefits of the1st Formations Business Scholarship, applicants need to fulfil the eligibility criteria listed below.Applicants should show a desire to run his/her own business.Should demonstrate academic excellence by providing a LOR from a tutor or course co-ordinator. It should be from the current course, i.e. from your current academic institution, not even a past course or an overseas academic institution.Should not be a previous recipient of the 1st Formations Business Scholarship.Should demonstrate personal circumstances that make them a suitable candidate for additional financial support.Thedeadline for the scholarshipis January 31,2026. Applicants who want to enjoy the grant provided for Ist Formations Business Scholarship areadvised to apply at the earliest.
eligibility_criteria.html_content:
1st Formations Business Scholarship is open to students who are currently studying in UG and PG degrees in universities in the U.S and the U.K.

To secure the benefits of the 1st Formations Business Scholarship, applicants need to fulfil the eligibility criteria listed below.

  • Applicants should show a desire to run his/her own business.
  • Should demonstrate academic excellence by providing a LOR from a tutor or course co-ordinator. It should be from the current course, i.e. from your current academic institution, not even a past course or an overseas academic institution.
  • Should not be a previous recipient of the 1st Formations Business Scholarship.
  • Should demonstrate personal circumstances that make them a suitable candidate for additional financial support.

The deadline for the scholarship is January 31,2026. Applicants who want to enjoy the grant provided for Ist Formations Business Scholarship are advised to apply at the earliest.

application_process.description: The application process for theIst Formations Business Scholarshipis easy. Applicants have to send their entries through emails with the required documents listed below:LOR from a tutor or course co-ordinator. Also, include a contact email address or telephone number for your sponsor.A note of recent grades/exam results from the current course. The grades should be a current course of study at UK/US academic institutions.A written submission of500 wordsthat explains what makes them a good candidate for the Scholarship. They can outline any circumstances which they feel may aid their application.Include detail on how they would use the funds to assist their studies if successful.500 words statementshould be simple and sound arguments presented in a neat and clear way. The statement should also include a plan to build a product or business that will help to improve the conditions of other needy and poverty.Completed applications should be mailed atscholarship@1stformations.co.ukNote:Grades from the past institution will not be accepted. Grades and exam results from overseas courses will only be accepted if they relate to studies undertaken as part of an exchange program on your current course and are verified by the UK or US institution.
application_process.html_content:
The application process for the Ist Formations Business Scholarship is easy. Applicants have to send their entries through emails with the required documents listed below:

  • LOR from a tutor or course co-ordinator. Also, include a contact email address or telephone number for your sponsor.
  • A note of recent grades/exam results from the current course. The grades should be a current course of study at UK/US academic institutions.
  • A written submission of 500 words that explains what makes them a good candidate for the Scholarship. They can outline any circumstances which they feel may aid their application.
  • Include detail on how they would use the funds to assist their studies if successful.

500 words statement should be simple and sound arguments presented in a neat and clear way. The statement should also include a plan to build a product or business that will help to improve the conditions of other needy and poverty.

Completed applications should be mailed at scholarship@1stformations.co.uk

Note: Grades from the past institution will not be accepted. Grades and exam results from overseas courses will only be accepted if they relate to studies undertaken as part of an exchange program on your current course and are verified by the UK or US institution.

selection_process.description: Applications for the1st Formations Business Scholarshipwill be assessed on the documents and write-up submitted during the application process. The application will be evaluated on the basis of :A 500-word Statement showcasing enthusiasm for studying and pursuing a career in business.The quality of the academic letter of recommendation and grades provided.Demonstration of their circumstances and need for further financial supportAll the required documents and 500-word statement will be evaluated and then 5studentswill be selected for the scholarship.Recipients of the scholarshipwill be contacted via email.
selection_process.html_content:
Applications for the 1st Formations Business Scholarship will be assessed on the documents and write-up submitted during the application process. The application will be evaluated on the basis of :

  • A 500-word Statement showcasing enthusiasm for studying and pursuing a career in business.
  • The quality of the academic letter of recommendation and grades provided.
  • Demonstration of their circumstances and need for further financial support

All the required documents and 500-word statement will be evaluated and then 5 students will be selected for the scholarship. Recipients of the scholarship will be contacted via email.

grant_details.description: As part of the ongoing dedication to supporting new business,1st Formationsis helping all the students studying UG and PG programs atUniversities in the UKand the US.The amount given for scholarship is500 GBP to 5 selected students. Thescholarship amount can only be usedfor the cost of course materials, textbooks, and other living expenses. Applicants have to submit a 500-word statement demonstrating enthusiasm for studying and pursuing a career in business. After the evaluation of the documents and statements submitted by the applicants, winners will be selected.Thedeadline for the1st formation Business Scholarship for applications of 2024-2025.is January 31, 2026, the successful candidates will be contacted andannounced by February 27, 2026.
grant_details.html_content:
As part of the ongoing dedication to supporting new business, 1st Formations is helping all the students studying UG and PG programs at Universities in the UK and the US.

The amount given for scholarship is 500 GBP to 5 selected students. The scholarship amount can only be used for the cost of course materials, textbooks, and other living expenses. Applicants have to submit a 500-word statement demonstrating enthusiasm for studying and pursuing a career in business. After the evaluation of the documents and statements submitted by the applicants, winners will be selected.

The deadline for the 1st formation Business Scholarship for applications of 2024-2025. is January 31, 2026, the successful candidates will be contacted and announced by February 27, 2026.

description:
The Kay-Grant Group Scholarship  is a type of annual scholarship provided by the Kay-Grant Group located in Scottdale, AZ, committed to benefiting all generations through education.

The Kay-Grant Group Scholarship is given to promote activity and interest in the fields of technology, entrepreneurship, and real-estate.

The winner of this scholarship will receive an amount of 1,000 USD that can be used to cover the tuition fee. The funds will be paid directly to the college or university and may be applied to an outstanding balance or to future tuition.

The Kay-Grant Group Scholarship is provided to assist those students & individuals, who are interested in real estate, entrepreneurship or technology, with obtaining a formal education.

This scholarship is applicable for Bachelors’s Degree and Diploma, Master’s Degree and diploma Ph.D. bachelor Certificate, Master’s Certificate, etc and is applicable to all U.S. universities.

Recipients of Kay-Grant Group Scholarship can use the award amount for the payment of the tuition fee. Some significant benefits of this scholarship are:

Details  Benefits 
Award Amount 1000 USD 
Award Duration  1 year 
Applicable Programs  Bachelors, Masters, Ph.D. programs at any University in the USA

Deadline: The scholarship contest is run on an annual basis. 

Note: The Kay-Grant Group Scholarship is not need-based and residing in Scottsdale, AZ or Arizona is not a requirement for an applicant of this scholarship.

eligibility_criteria.description: Applicants must fulfill the following given requirements to be eligible for the Kay-Grant Group Scholarship:Academic Eligibility: The student should be currently enrolled in a college or university, and need not have already started their semester, they can fill the application in between or just after admission also.Residential Eligibility: The student may or may not be a United States citizen.Applicant must show their interest in real estate, entrepreneurship, and technologyRecipient of theKay-Grant Group Scholarship 2021will receive an amount of1,000 USD to use towards tuition.The funds are paid directly to the college or university.
eligibility_criteria.html_content:
Applicants must fulfill the following given requirements to be eligible for the Kay-Grant Group Scholarship:

  1. Academic Eligibility: The student should be currently enrolled in a college or university, and need not have already started their semester, they can fill the application in between or just after admission also.
  2. Residential Eligibility: The student may or may not be a United States citizen.
  3. Applicant must show their interest in real estate, entrepreneurship, and technology

Recipient of the Kay-Grant Group Scholarship 2021 will receive an amount of 1,000 USD to use towards tuition. The funds are paid directly to the college or university.

application_process.description: TheKay-Grant Group Scholarship 2021applications are accepted online. Applicants have to create and submit a video.Submission of a video clip is very essential in order to apply for the Kay-Grant Group scholarship. The video clip should be created keeping in mind the following points:The video clip should be less than 2 minutes in length.Applicants should share the video using YouTube.The video clip should include answers to questions such as: Why the student believes that scholarship could help him/her, in achieving their goals and aspirationsThey should be creative with this.They can also make whiteboard videos, animated videos, commercials, etc, in case they don't want to picture themselves.The video clip may relate to either technology, real estate, or entrepreneurship.The step-by-step application process for theKay-Grant Group Scholarship is given below:Step 1:Upload the video on YouTube and include "Kay-Grant Group Scholarship" in the title and add a link: http://kay-grant.com/scholarships in the video's description section.Step 2:After uploading the video, notify the committee by sending an email toscholarships@kay-grant.com.The mail should include a link to the video uploaded.The applicant is required to submit the following details while submitting application form:The full name, mailing address, and phone number.The name of the college or university that the student is attending currently.Proof of enrolment of the student at that university or college.The course of study one is pursuing or planning to pursue.
application_process.html_content:
The Kay-Grant Group Scholarship 2021 applications are accepted online. Applicants have to create and submit a video.

Submission of a video clip is very essential in order to apply for the Kay-Grant Group scholarship. The video clip should be created keeping in mind the following points:

  • The video clip should be less than 2 minutes in length.
  • Applicants should share the video using YouTube.
  • The video clip should include answers to questions such as: Why the student believes that scholarship could help him/her, in achieving their goals and aspirations
  • They should be creative with this.
  • They can also make whiteboard videos, animated videos, commercials, etc, in case they don't want to picture themselves.
  • The video clip may relate to either technology, real estate, or entrepreneurship.

The step-by-step application process for the Kay-Grant Group Scholarship is given below:

Step 1: Upload the video on YouTube and include "Kay-Grant Group Scholarship" in the title and add a link: http://kay-grant.com/scholarships in the video's description section.

Step 2: After uploading the video, notify the committee by sending an email to scholarships@kay-grant.com. The mail should include a link to the video uploaded.

The applicant is required to submit the following details while submitting application form:

  • The full name, mailing address, and phone number.
  • The name of the college or university that the student is attending currently.
  • Proof of enrolment of the student at that university or college.
  • The course of study one is pursuing or planning to pursue.

selection_process.description: After the submission of the application form of theKay-Grant Group Scholarship, applicants are selected by a panel of selectors of the Kay-Grant Scholarship. The video will also be judged on the basis of overall quality, creativity, and clarity. Applicants should give their best of abilities while making a video.Energetic students are selected based on their interest in any of the following:Real estateEntrepreneurshipTechnologyMarketingRecipients of the scholarship will be contacted and funds will be transferred directly to their college or universities.
selection_process.html_content:
After the submission of the application form of the Kay-Grant Group Scholarship, applicants are selected by a panel of selectors of the Kay-Grant Scholarship. The video will also be judged on the basis of overall quality, creativity, and clarity. Applicants should give their best of abilities while making a video.

Energetic students are selected based on their interest in any of the following:

  • Real estate
  • Entrepreneurship
  • Technology
  • Marketing

Recipients of the scholarship will be contacted and funds will be transferred directly to their college or universities.

They are as follows :The video of the student may be used for promotional or marketing purposes by the AZ real estate Group.The committee also expects the winning applicant to consent the announcement of the Kay-Grant Group Scholarship award to promote the scholarship program for the prospective future participants.
grant_details.html_content:
The Kay-Grant Group Scholarship is a financial aid scholarship and covers the tuition & fees of the student. The table below provides all the significant details regarding the Kay-Grant Group Scholarship:

Study-Level Undergraduate/Postgraduate/ masters/ Ph.D
Eligible Candidates International students, studying at Undergraduate or Masters level at any universities of USA
Number of Scholarship Vary
Study-Length May vary depending upon the degree pursued by the student
Scholarship Awar 1,000 USD
Award Distributed Annually(one time)

Terms & Conditions for the Kay-Grant Group Scholarship 

Along with knowing how to obtain the Kay-Grant Group Scholarship , it is important for each applicant to know the terms and conditions of the scholarship. They are as follows :

  • The video of the student may be used for promotional or marketing purposes by the AZ real estate Group.
  • The committee also expects the winning applicant to consent the announcement of the Kay-Grant Group Scholarship award to promote the scholarship program for the prospective future participants.

description:
The Griffith Remarkable Scholarship provides international students with an opportunity to pursue an undergraduate or graduate degree at Griffith University, one of the best universities in Australia. Through this scholarship program, students get a chance to explore their academic potential, different subject areas, cultures, and experiences.

Recipients of the Griffith Remarkable Scholarship get a 50% tuition fee waiver for the duration of their chosen Griffith UG or PG program. Since the Griffith Remarkable Scholarship reward can be used for the payment of tuition fees, it helps in reducing the financial burden on international students.

Read more scholarships:-

         Ontario Graduate Scholarship
         Tata Scholarship- Cornell University
         GREAT Scholarships India

eligibility_criteria.description: As mentioned earlier, the Griffith Remarkable Scholarship program is only applicable to international students, i.e., citizens of a country other than Australia or New Zealand. Therefore, applicants must provide a copy of theirvalid passportas proof of residency.Apart from this, applicants must apply and secure admission in any UG/PG program atGriffith University. The eligibility criteria for the same are:GPA Score:The minimum GPA requirements vary for UG and PG admissions.For UG, applicants must meet the country-specific academic requirements. (Eg: Indian students must have at least 82% in class XII).For PG, applicants must have a minimum GPA score of 3.0 on a 4.0 scale or 5.5 on a 7.0 scale.English Proficiency Score:Applicants must meet the minimum score requirement of any one of the following tests:TOEFL-iBT: 79IELTS: 6.5PTE: 50TOEFL-PBT: 575One must be applying for a relevant UG/PG program as a new student enrolling for any of the three trimesters at Griffith University.
eligibility_criteria.html_content:
As mentioned earlier, the Griffith Remarkable Scholarship program is only applicable to international students, i.e., citizens of a country other than Australia or New Zealand. Therefore, applicants must provide a copy of their valid passport as proof of residency.

Apart from this, applicants must apply and secure admission in any UG/PG program at Griffith University. The eligibility criteria for the same are:

  • GPA Score: The minimum GPA requirements vary for UG and PG admissions.
    • For UG, applicants must meet the country-specific academic requirements. (Eg: Indian students must have at least 82% in class XII).
    • For PG, applicants must have a minimum GPA score of 3.0 on a 4.0 scale or 5.5 on a 7.0 scale.
  • English Proficiency Score: Applicants must meet the minimum score requirement of any one of the following tests:
    • TOEFL-iBT: 79
    • IELTS: 6.5
    • PTE: 50
    • TOEFL-PBT: 575

One must be applying for a relevant UG/PG program as a new student enrolling for any of the three trimesters at Griffith University.

application_process.description: International students who fulfill the eligibility criteria can proceed to complete the Griffith Remarkable Scholarship application form. Scholarship applications are accepted for all three trimesters of Griffith University.Prospective applicants must apply for the Griffith Remarkable Scholarship before the deadlines mentioned in the table:SessionApplication DeadlinesDecision Dates*Trimester IDecember 3, 2022December 21, 2022Trimester IIApril 15, 2023May 12, 2023Trimester IIIAugust 4, 2023August 23, 2023*The decision on each trimester’s scholarship applications will be declared on or by these dates.
application_process.html_content:
International students who fulfill the eligibility criteria can proceed to complete the Griffith Remarkable Scholarship application form. Scholarship applications are accepted for all three trimesters of Griffith University.

Prospective applicants must apply for the Griffith Remarkable Scholarship before the deadlines mentioned in the table:

Session Application Deadlines Decision Dates*
Trimester I December 3, 2022 December 21, 2022
Trimester II April 15, 2023 May 12, 2023
Trimester III August 4, 2023 August 23, 2023

*The decision on each trimester’s scholarship applications will be declared on or by these dates.

Evaluation of the applications will be based on the following factors:Completion of the scholarship application form before the published deadline.Academic merit in prior studiesAssessment of a personal statement that assesses why the applicant has chosen this scholarship program. The statement should be between250 and 500 words.Terms and Conditions:Griffith University admissionentry requirements applyThe scholarship reward covers 50% of full-time UG/PG coursework tuition fees only.It is solely meant for international students who belong to a country other than Australia and New Zealand.One must be an International Fee Paying student to qualify for the scholarship and each scholarship deduction. selection_process.html_content:
Griffith Remarkable Scholarship applications will be assessed and awarded based on recommendations by a university panel. Evaluation of the applications will be based on the following factors:

  • Completion of the scholarship application form before the published deadline.
  • Academic merit in prior studies
  • Assessment of a personal statement that assesses why the applicant has chosen this scholarship program. The statement should be between 250 and 500 words.

Terms and Conditions:

  • Griffith University admission entry requirements apply
  • The scholarship reward covers 50% of full-time UG/PG coursework tuition fees only.
  • It is solely meant for international students who belong to a country other than Australia and New Zealand.
  • One must be an International Fee Paying student to qualify for the scholarship and each scholarship deduction. Any change from International Fee Paying student status will result in the withdrawal of the scholarship.
  • Students must remain enrolled in the program for which the scholarship offer was made. Deferral of scholarships is not permitted.
  • One must maintain a minimum cumulative GPA of 5.5 on a 7.0 grading scale to qualify for each tuition fee deduction.
  • The scholarship does not include online, non-award, research and offshore delivered programs.

description:
The City Law School is firmly committed to a generous programme of scholarships awarded on the basis of academic excellence. 

Selection for Dean's Scholarships for Academic Excellence will be based on academic excellence, a personal statement and academic references of the candidates.

Applications for courses beginning September 2025 have now closed.

eligibility_criteria.description: You must hold an upper second or first degree (or international equivalent)You must hold an offer of a place on one of the courses specified below at The City Law School. The offer can be conditional or unconditional and you do not need to have accepted your place in order to apply for a scholarshipYou can be of any fee paying status (Home, or international) and be studying full-time or part-time.
eligibility_criteria.html_content:
• You must hold an upper second or first degree (or international equivalent)
  • You must hold an offer of a place on one of the courses specified below at The City Law School. The offer can be conditional or unconditional and you do not need to have accepted your place in order to apply for a scholarship
  • You can be of any fee paying status (Home, or international) and be studying full-time or part-time.

application_process.description: To apply for the Dean's Scholarships for Academic Excellence, applicants have to complete the scholarship form available on the university website. They have to submit required documents along with application form.Student Supporting DocumentationA statement of500 wordsstating the reason why they should receive the scholarship.Academic references including grades obtained in the first and second years of their study.Details of the applicants that include full name, student number, and name of the applied course.Applications for September 2024 and January 2025 are now open.4 November 2024 (January 2025 intake only).16 June 2025 (for September 2025 intake only)applications for courses beginning September 2025 have now closed.
application_process.html_content:
To apply for the Dean's Scholarships for Academic Excellence, applicants have to complete the scholarship form available on the university website. They have to submit required documents along with application form.

Student Supporting Documentation

  1. A statement of 500 words stating the reason why they should receive the scholarship.
  2. Academic references including grades obtained in the first and second years of their study.
  3. Details of the applicants that include full name, student number, and name of the applied course.

Applications for September 2024 and January 2025 are now open.

  • 4 November 2024 (January 2025 intake only).
  • 16 June 2025 (for September 2025 intake only)
  • applications for courses beginning September 2025 have now closed.

selection_process.description: The selection process of Dean's Scholarships for Academic Excellence takes place once the applications are received by the university.Scholarship Panel will review applications case-by-case.Selection will be based on academic excellence, a personal statement and academic references.Applicants with an average grade of 70% or above will be considered for the scholarship.The candidates will be informed within 4 weeks when the application will be reviewed.The decision of the selection panel is considered to be final and no more communication will be entertained.
selection_process.html_content:
The selection process of Dean's Scholarships for Academic Excellence takes place once the applications are received by the university.

  • Scholarship Panel will review applications case-by-case.
  • Selection will be based on academic excellence, a personal statement and academic references.
  • Applicants with an average grade of 70% or above will be considered for the scholarship.

The candidates will be informed within 4 weeks when the application will be reviewed.

The decision of the selection panel is considered to be final and no more communication will be entertained.

grant_details.html_content:
Dean's Scholarships for Academic Excellence provides financial support for international students in the UK to study at the University of London.

For full-time students: The total amount is offered in the form of a fee waiver from the second fee installment.
