scholarship_name: Queen's University Principal's International Scholarship India
description:
Queen’s University Principal’s International Scholarship India is a type of automatic admission scholarship offered to Indian. Students beginning their chosen undergraduate program at Queen’s University are eligible for this scholarship program.

Queen’s University Principal’s International Scholarship India program is renewable as it is awarded for the duration of the UG program. However, applicants must fulfill the ongoing eligibility criteria established by university officials.

The latest deadline is yet to be announced.

eligibility_criteria.description: Queen’s University Principal’s International Scholarship India is awarded to Indian students who are studying at the university at UG level. Prospective applicants must meet the eligibility criteria established by the university:Proof of residency and Indian citizenshipstudents who have dual citizenship and permanent residents are not eligible.Unconditional admission offer to anyundergraduate program at Queen’s University.Students must have registered for the fall or winter semesters.Academic records of high school education.Ongoing EligibilityQueen’s University Principal’s International Scholarship India is renewable. Students must renew their applications to the scholarship so that they can keep enjoying the benefits of the scholarship every academic year.To renew their scholarship application, students need to maintain aminimum 3.5 GPA or higher. Students also must have at least 80% course load which is equal to 24 units for the fall and winter semester.
eligibility_criteria.html_content:
Queen’s University Principal’s International Scholarship India is awarded to Indian students who are studying at the university at UG level. Prospective applicants must meet the eligibility criteria established by the university:

  • Proof of residency and Indian citizenship
    • students who have dual citizenship and permanent residents are not eligible.
  • Unconditional admission offer to any undergraduate program at Queen’s University.
    • Students must have registered for the fall or winter semesters.
  • Academic records of high school education.

Ongoing Eligibility

Queen’s University Principal’s International Scholarship India is renewable. Students must renew their applications to the scholarship so that they can keep enjoying the benefits of the scholarship every academic year.

To renew their scholarship application, students need to maintain a minimum 3.5 GPA or higher. Students also must have at least 80% course load which is equal to 24 units for the fall and winter semester.

application_process.description: Queen’s University Principal’s International Scholarship India does not require candidates to submit an additional application form. The scholarship is a part of the Automatic Admission Scholarships available at Queen’s University.Applicants who fulfill the eligibility criteria will be automatically considered for the scholarship. Documents submitted at the time of admission will be evaluated at the time of selection.
application_process.html_content:
Queen’s University Principal’s International Scholarship India does not require candidates to submit an additional application form. The scholarship is a part of the Automatic Admission Scholarships available at Queen’s University.

Applicants who fulfill the eligibility criteria will be automatically considered for the scholarship. Documents submitted at the time of admission will be evaluated at the time of selection.

selection_process.description: As part of the shortlisting process, the selection panel of the Queen’s University reviews the academic grades of the applicants. The panel calculates an average of all the grades submitted at the time of admission. Shortlisted students, for Queen’s University Principal’s International Scholarship India, are informed about the panel’s decision via email.Note:For all the international students in the various educational systems, the average grades are calculated in a manner that is consistent with the calculation and criteria used for admission purposes.
selection_process.html_content:
As part of the shortlisting process, the selection panel of the Queen’s University reviews the academic grades of the applicants. The panel calculates an average of all the grades submitted at the time of admission. Shortlisted students, for Queen’s University Principal’s International Scholarship India, are informed about the panel’s decision via email.

Note: For all the international students in the various educational systems, the average grades are calculated in a manner that is consistent with the calculation and criteria used for admission purposes.

grant_details.description: Queen’s University Principal’s International Scholarship India is meant for Indian students pursuing the UG program. All the shortlisted students are evaluated on their marks submitting during theiradmission at Queen’s University.The university has its own method of calculating the average of the subjects submitted by the student. Every academic year, five students are selected for the Principal’s International Scholarship.Students must maintain a3.5 minimum GPAand must maintain an80% course loadduring their first year to be eligible for renewability. The scholarship must be renewed at the start of every academic year to keep receiving scholarship benefits.
grant_details.html_content:
Queen’s University Principal’s International Scholarship India is meant for Indian students pursuing the UG program. All the shortlisted students are evaluated on their marks submitting during their admission at Queen’s University.

The university has its own method of calculating the average of the subjects submitted by the student. Every academic year, five students are selected for the Principal’s International Scholarship. 

Students must maintain a 3.5 minimum GPA and must maintain an 80% course load during their first year to be eligible for renewability. The scholarship must be renewed at the start of every academic year to keep receiving scholarship benefits.

scholarship_name: La Trobe College Excellence Scholarship- South Asia
description:
La Trobe University offers many scholarships to international students who want to pursue higher education in Australia. One such scholarship is the La Trobe College Excellence Scholarship-South Asia awarded to international students who have an excellent academic background. 

International students who are the citizen of any country India, Sri Lanka, Pakistan, Kenya, Nepal, Bangladesh or Mauritius can apply for the scholarship.  

The scholarship is available to students who wish to study UG and PG programs at La Trobe University. The Scholarship covers the tuition fees for high achieving international students admitted in the UG and PG  program. 

It reduces the annual course fees by 50% depending upon WAM of the students. WAM is the average mark obtained across all completed units in a course, including any failed and repeated units. The WAM is out of 100.

The following table shows WAM  and the percentage of scholarship students receive on tuition fees.

The amount of scholarship will be given according to the WAM of students. This scholarship is available for both full-time and part-time study.

This scholarship is not available to students who are currently enrolled at La Trobe University. La Trobe College Excellence Scholarship is limited and may not be available to every eligible student.

eligibility_criteria.description: To apply for theLa Trobe College Excellence Scholarships, the applicant should fulfill the following eligibility criteria:Be a citizen and resident of India, Sri Lanka, Pakistan, Kenya, Nepal, Bangladesh or MauritiusBe applying for one of theLa Trobe International Scholarship (LTIS) list of eligible courses.Be 18 years old or older at the commencement of the course; or must live with a student guardian approved by the Department of Home Affairs until they turn 18 years of age.Have an overall WAM* achievement of 80% or above.Commence their studies at any of the La Trobe University Victorian Campuses in 2024.Meet the University's English language requirements and all other conditions stated on the Offer Letter.They should meet the English Language requirement.English language ExamsMinimum scores (UG)Minimum Scores (PG)IELTS(Academic)6.0 (6.0 in each component)6.5 (6.0 in each component)TOEFL (PBT)550, with 5 or above in TWE (Test of Written English)550, with 5 or above in TWE (Test of Written English)TOEFL (iBT)64 (13 in reading, 12 in listening, 18 in speaking and 21 in writing)79 (13 in reading, 12 in listening, 18 in speaking and 21 in writing)Pearson Test of English(PTE)5058
eligibility_criteria.html_content:
To apply for the La Trobe College Excellence Scholarships, the applicant should fulfill the following eligibility criteria:

  • Be a citizen and resident of India, Sri Lanka, Pakistan, Kenya, Nepal, Bangladesh or Mauritius
  • Be applying for one of the La Trobe International Scholarship (LTIS) list of eligible courses.
  • Be 18 years old or older at the commencement of the course; or must live with a student guardian approved by the Department of Home Affairs until they turn 18 years of age.
  • Have an overall WAM* achievement of 80% or above.
  • Commence their studies at any of the La Trobe University Victorian Campuses in 2024.
  • Meet the University's English language requirements and all other conditions stated on the Offer Letter.
  • They should meet the English Language requirement. 
English language Exams Minimum scores (UG) Minimum Scores (PG)
IELTS (Academic) 6.0 (6.0 in each component) 6.5 (6.0 in each component)
TOEFL (PBT) 550, with 5 or above in TWE (Test of Written English) 550, with 5 or above in TWE (Test of Written English)
TOEFL (iBT) 64 (13 in reading, 12 in listening, 18 in speaking and 21 in writing) 79 (13 in reading, 12 in listening, 18 in speaking and 21 in writing)
Pearson Test of English (PTE) 50 58

application_process.description: Applicants must submit a complete application for the course commencing in Semester 2 (July) or Summer 1 / Term 6 (November) intake of 2024 at La Trobe University - Victorian campuses.Applicants must also provide the following documents before the application closing date:A detailed resumeA personal statement of no more than 300 words or a 3-4 minute video to detail "Why you should be awarded with the La Trobe University Excellence Scholarship".Applicants who have already applied for Semester 2 or Summer 1/Term 6 of 2024 will be considered for the scholarship if they meet the eligibility criteria. They must send their resume and personal statement by the specified date.Recipient obligationsMaintain a full-time enrolment at one of the La Trobe University campuses in Australia and satisfactory academic progress during their studies.The scholarship award recipients must be willing to be an international student ambassador for La Trobe International during their study period.Please also refer to the terms and conditions included in the Offer Letter.
application_process.html_content:
1. Applicants must submit a complete application for the course commencing in Semester 2 (July) or Summer 1 / Term 6 (November) intake of 2024 at La Trobe University - Victorian campuses.
  2. Applicants must also provide the following documents before the application closing date:
    • A detailed resume
    • A personal statement of no more than 300 words or a 3-4 minute video to detail "Why you should be awarded with the La Trobe University Excellence Scholarship".


Applicants who have already applied for Semester 2 or Summer 1/Term 6 of 2024 will be considered for the scholarship if they meet the eligibility criteria. They must send their resume and personal statement by the specified date.

Recipient obligations

  • Maintain a full-time enrolment at one of the La Trobe University campuses in Australia and satisfactory academic progress during their studies.
  • The scholarship award recipients must be willing to be an international student ambassador for La Trobe International during their study period.
  • Please also refer to the terms and conditions included in the Offer Letter.

selection_process.description: Students need not apply separately. If they meet the admission requirement, the scholarship team will consider them for the same. The students are selected based on theirAcademic performance, extra-curricular activities, and any other outstanding achievements.The selected students will receive a scholarship award letter through email. They will have to meet all the conditions mentioned in the offer letter and accept it as soon a possible to secure theLa Trobe College Excellence Scholarship.
selection_process.html_content:
Students need not apply separately. If they meet the admission requirement, the scholarship team will consider them for the same. The students are selected based on their Academic performance, extra-curricular activities, and any other outstanding achievements.

The selected students will receive a scholarship award letter through email. They will have to meet all the conditions mentioned in the offer letter and accept it as soon a possible to secure the La Trobe College Excellence Scholarship.

grant_details.description: La Trobe College Excellence Scholarship provides an opportunity for international students to study at La Trobe University with a reduction in their tuition fees. 50% reduction in course fees and it depends on theirweighted average marks (WAM).So, this is an opportunity for students with excellent academic history to study abroad.Students who wish tostudy in Australiaat La Trobe University are advised to check the official website of the university for further updates.
grant_details.html_content:
La Trobe College Excellence Scholarship provides an opportunity for international students to study at La Trobe University with a reduction in their tuition fees. 50% reduction in course fees and it depends on their weighted average marks (WAM).

So, this is an opportunity for students with excellent academic history to study abroad. 

Students who wish to study in Australia at La Trobe University are advised to check the official website of the university for further updates.

description:
Each year, the Claes Isacson Foundation grants financial aid to students having a keen interest in the marine insurance markets. The Claes Isacson Scholarship is offered by Claes Isacson Foundation to help the young students with their finances who wish to pursue a career in shipping and marine insurance sectors. 

The Claes Isacson Scholarship is open to all students around the world. They must meet the eligibility criteria to be considered for the same.

Students above 18 years of age are invited to apply for the Claes Issacson Scholarship, which provides financial aid of up to  20,000 USD. The amount may be awarded to one student or split between many students. 

The awardees of  the Claes Isacson Scholarship will receive the scholarship in tranche parts : 

The latest deadline is yet to be announced.

The latest deadline is yet to be announced.

eligibility_criteria.description: Candidates aspiring for the scholarship must show an excellent record in academics and extra-curricular activities. Applicants for Claes Isacson Scholarship have to Eligibility criteria listed below :Candidates enrolled at a university or equivalent institution, focusing on subjects related to theMarine Insurance BusinessorShipping Industry.Should provide certified copies of exam certificates, detailing the educational programs they are enrolled in to be eligibleCandidates presenting a post-graduation plan, detailing the extent to which the scholarship has aided in the finance of special projects or education programs that they have already commenced.Candidates presenting their future plans, describing their intent to pursue a career in the shipping and marine insurance business.
eligibility_criteria.html_content:
Candidates aspiring for the scholarship must show an excellent record in academics and extra-curricular activities. Applicants for Claes Isacson Scholarship have to Eligibility criteria listed below : 

  • Candidates enrolled at a university or equivalent institution, focusing on subjects related to the Marine Insurance Business or Shipping Industry.
  • Should provide certified copies of exam certificates, detailing the educational programs they are enrolled in to be eligible 
  • Candidates presenting a post-graduation plan, detailing the extent to which the scholarship has aided in the finance of special projects or education programs that they have already commenced.
  • Candidates presenting their future plans, describing their intent to pursue a career in the shipping and marine insurance business.

application_process.description: Applicants have to submit an online application form for Claes Isacson Scholarships. The step-by-step process involved in the application process is given below:Step 1:Visit the online application portal of the scholarship, available on the official website of the scholarship.Step 2:Access the application form and complete the required details.Step 3:Attach the documents required.Step 4:Submit the application form.Step 5:Check upon the decision via email.Along with application form, applicants have to submit the required documents listed below:Updated ResumeOfficial copies of exam certificates of the current educational programsProof of enrolment in the mentioned educational programsPrepare a Presentation of future plans, detailing the intent to pursue careers in the Shipping and Marine Insurance sectors.The latest deadline is yet to be announced.
application_process.html_content:
Applicants have to submit an online application form for Claes Isacson Scholarships. The step-by-step process involved in the application process is given below: 

Step 1: Visit the online application portal of the scholarship, available on the official website of the scholarship.

Step 2: Access the application form and complete the required details. 

Step 3: Attach the documents required.

Step 4: Submit the application form.

Step 5: Check upon the decision via email.

Along with application form, applicants have to submit the required documents listed below: 

  • Updated Resume
  • Official copies of exam certificates of the current educational programs 
  • Proof of enrolment in the mentioned educational programs
  • Prepare a Presentation of future plans, detailing the intent to pursue careers in the Shipping and Marine Insurance sectors.

The latest deadline is yet to be announced.

selection_process.description: After the successful submission of the application form, the scholarship committee will then review application forms of students.The selection committee will evaluate applicants on the basis of the following criteria:Applicant’s inclination towards the shipping industry and/or the marine insurance business.The applicant's presentation, outlining their future plans and the purpose of finance that they are seeking.The presented documents and copies of exam certificates.The Selection Committee will interview selected applicants before announcing the winner of the scholarship
selection_process.html_content:
After the successful submission of the application form, the scholarship committee will then review application forms of students. 
The selection committee will evaluate applicants on the basis of the following criteria: 

  • Applicant’s inclination towards the shipping industry and/or the marine insurance business.
  • The applicant's presentation, outlining their future plans and the purpose of finance that they are seeking.
  • The presented documents and copies of exam certificates. 

The Selection Committee will interview selected applicants before announcing the winner of the scholarship

grant_details.html_content:
The Claes Isacson Scholarship is awarded annually. The amount of 20,000 USD may be awarded to one student or split between many students. 

After the completion of the program, scholars are required to submit a report, summarising the benefits of receiving the award and an account report of the funds spent.  

Terms and Conditions of Claes Isacson Scholarship

Along with knowing how to obtain the Claes Isacson Scholarship, it is significant for each applicant to know the scholarship’s terms and conditions. They are as follows :

  • As the scholarship is awarded in two trenches, students must retain eligibility in order to qualify for the second round of reward.
  • Candidates must adhere to the information requirements of the Gard Scholarship Committee
  • A report after the completion of the course program. 
  • A statement confirming the authenticity of the fund allocation.
  • The candidate's failure to present documents will be a cause for disqualification and termination of the award. 
  • Candidates are required to provide a letter of acceptance of the scholarship, with an acknowledgment of the intention to use the funds allocated, and a confirmation that the terms and conditions are met. 

The latest deadline is yet to be announced.

description:
The FormSwift Scholarship Program is designed by the FormSwift organisation to support students who dream of becoming entrepreneurs. The scholarship program is applicable for high school seniors, undergraduates, and graduate students looking to build their own businesses later. The scholarship is a great way to jump-start their dreams.

Unlike other scholarships that require students to submit academic transcripts, LOR, essay, etc, FormSwift Scholarship Program asks them to design a business plan infographic. Every year, the trust selects one winner who is rewarded 1,000 USD. The selection of the recipient is based on the infographic submitted on any of the following topics:

The more unique and creative the business plan is, the better the chances are of the entry being selected. FormSwift holds the scholarship competition four times in one year and there are deadlines for submission for each round. They are :  

Round for the scholarship  Application Deadline 
Summer  August 15, 2021
Fall   November 15, 2021
Winter  February 15, 2022
Spring April 15, 2022

Applicants interested in the scholarship can apply for the Spring Round. Entries must be sent before April 15, 2022, to be considered for the scholarship. FormSwift wishes to help students develop the essential skills to help them in their job search later on or to help build their own business.

NOTE: APPLICATION FORMS FOR 2025 ARE YET TO COME

eligibility_criteria.description: To secure the benefits of  theFormSwift Scholarship Program,applicants have to meet the eligibility criteria mentioned below :Applicants must be a High School senior or enrolled in a college.Applications from both community and private colleges are accepted.International students from outside the United States can apply to the scholarship too.The students must be in a college or must be about to graduate from high school.No applicant should be related to any staff or extended connections of Formswift.
eligibility_criteria.html_content:
To secure the benefits of  the FormSwift Scholarship Program, applicants have to meet the eligibility criteria mentioned below : 

  • Applicants must be a High School senior or enrolled in a college. 
    • Applications from both community and private colleges are accepted.
  • International students from outside the United States can apply to the scholarship too. 
    • The students must be in a college or must be about to graduate from high school.
  • No applicant should be related to any staff or extended connections of Formswift.

application_process.description: As part of the application process of the FormSwift Scholarship Program, applicants are required to submit an infographic for a business plan. The business plan must be based on one of the following areas:StartupRestaurantTransportationNon-Profit orClothingOnce a topic is chosen for the infographic and prepared, the next step is submitting it.FormSwiftrequires all candidates to submit their infographics through e-mail. An e-mail will be considered as an entry to the scholarship.The email subject must be ‘FormSwift Scholarship Entry’to make sure no email is missed. Details like full name of the candidate, state and school name must also be included in the email Emails must be sent toJamie@formswift.com.No entries will be considered that are submitted after the deadline.It must be noted that all submissions, once sent, become the property of FormSwift.
application_process.html_content:
As part of the application process of the FormSwift Scholarship Program, applicants are required to submit an infographic for a business plan. The business plan must be based on one of the following areas:

  • Startup
  • Restaurant
  • Transportation
  • Non-Profit or
  • Clothing 

Once a topic is chosen for the infographic and prepared, the next step is submitting it. FormSwift requires all candidates to submit their infographics through e-mail. An e-mail will be considered as an entry to the scholarship. 

The email subject must be ‘FormSwift Scholarship Entry’ to make sure no email is missed. Details like full name of the candidate, state and school name must also be included in the email Emails must be sent to Jamie@formswift.com .

No entries will be considered that are submitted after the deadline.

It must be noted that all submissions, once sent, become the property of FormSwift.

selection_process.description: The selection process for the FormSwift Scholarship Program is competitive as it is awarded toonly one student.The infographic submitted by students should be creative and informative, keeping in mind their future business plans. This will help the selection panel to understand an applicant’s vision and future goals.Each entry’s academics are judged on the basis of the graduation dateRecipientof the FormSwift Scholarship Program will be announced after the selection panel will review all the entries.Note:The organization has the right to verify the academic credentials of the applicants. FormSwift will verify the date of the candidate’s high school graduation or the college enrollment date.
selection_process.html_content:
The selection process for the FormSwift Scholarship Program is competitive as it is awarded to only one student. 

The infographic submitted by students should be creative and informative, keeping in mind their future business plans. This will help the selection panel to understand an applicant’s vision and future goals.

 Each entry’s academics are judged on the basis of the graduation date

Recipient of the FormSwift Scholarship Program will be announced after the selection panel will review all the entries.

Note: The organization has the right to verify the academic credentials of the applicants. FormSwift will verify the date of the candidate’s high school graduation or the college enrollment date.

grant_details.description: FormSwift is an online tool that helps people create, edit, sign and work on documents, forms, etc. It offers memberships where people can choose from FormSwift’s wide library of document templates and form templates to work on. People can also upload and work on their own documents as well.FormSwift has designedFormSwift Scholarship Programfor self-driven and upcoming entrepreneurs who are ready to build a better world through their business ideas. Recipient of the FormSwift Scholarship Program will get an amount of1,000 USD.FormSwift has a set list of topics on which a business plan and an infographic must be developed. A business plan infographic could be aboutstartup, restaurant, no-profit, transportation or about a clothing business.The scholarship is open to both domestic as well as international students.Entries can be done by emailing the infographic to FormSwift along with details of the candidate like full name, state, and school name of the student. The scholarship is awarded toone studentand is held in four rounds each year.
grant_details.html_content:
FormSwift is an online tool that helps people create, edit, sign and work on documents, forms, etc. It offers memberships where people can choose from FormSwift’s wide library of document templates and form templates to work on. People can also upload and work on their own documents as well. 

FormSwift has designed  FormSwift Scholarship Program for self-driven and upcoming entrepreneurs who are ready to build a better world through their business ideas. Recipient of the FormSwift Scholarship Program will get an amount of 1,000 USD.

FormSwift has a set list of topics on which a business plan and an infographic must be developed. A business plan infographic could be about startup, restaurant, no-profit, transportation or about a clothing business. The scholarship is open to both domestic as well as international students.

Entries can be done by emailing the infographic to FormSwift along with details of the candidate like full name, state, and school name of the student. The scholarship is awarded to one student and is held in four rounds each year.

description:
The Ariyaratnam Scholarship aims to cover the tutelage of the students of either department, Faculty of Business Administration or Faculty of Natural and Mathematical Sciences at King’s College London. 

Every year, two students commencing a UG degree at King’s College London are awarded the Ariyaratnam Scholarship:

Both recipients receive a scholarship reward of 19,758 USD. The reward amount is distributed in three installments of 6,574 USD per year and covers the recipient’s tuition fees at the institution.

The latest deadline is yet to be announced.

eligibility_criteria.description: The eligibility criteria for the Ariyaratnam Scholarship is given below:The latest deadline is yet to be announced.Undertaking a program in either theFaculty of Business(excluding language joint honors program) orFaculty of Natural and Mathematical Sciences.Minimum household income of 56,102 USD.Applicants must provide consent to share this information with King’sHave achieved AAB or above in their A level examination or any equivalent international exam too.Note:The recipients of the scholarship will not be eligible for payment in years in which they are resitting, repeating, intercalating or interrupting. They will also cease to be eligible for the payment in case of withdrawal of admission or transfer of course.
eligibility_criteria.html_content:
The eligibility criteria for the Ariyaratnam Scholarship is given below:

  • The latest deadline is yet to be announced.
  • Undertaking a program in either the Faculty of Business (excluding language joint honors program) or Faculty of Natural and Mathematical Sciences.
  • Minimum household income of 56,102 USD.
    • Applicants must provide consent to share this information with King’s
  • Have achieved AAB or above in their A level examination or any equivalent international exam too.

Note: The recipients of the scholarship will not be eligible for payment in years in which they are resitting, repeating, intercalating or interrupting. They will also cease to be eligible for the payment in case of withdrawal of admission or transfer of course.

application_process.description: To apply for the scholarship program, you must submit an online application form. The form will be available on the official website in a PDF format.The deadline for Ariyaratnam Scholarshipis yet to be announced.You are required to submit all the required documents before the deadline. If not, your application will be automatically rejected.Documents Required for Ariyaratnam Scholarship ApplicationTo be considered for Ariyaratnam Scholarship, you have to submit the following documents:Copy of letters confirming any grants/bursary/scholarships to study at the King’s.Word/pdf supporting statement.Financial statementThe completed application along with financial document must be properly scanned and emailed to funding@kcl.ac.uk.
application_process.html_content:
To apply for the scholarship program, you must submit an online application form. The form will be available on the official website in a PDF format. 

The deadline for Ariyaratnam Scholarship is yet to be announced. You are required to submit all the required documents before the deadline. If not, your application will be automatically rejected.

Documents Required for Ariyaratnam Scholarship Application

To be considered for Ariyaratnam Scholarship, you have to submit the following documents:

  • Copy of letters confirming any grants/bursary/scholarships to study at the King’s.
  • Word/pdf supporting statement. 
  • Financial statement

The completed application along with financial document must be properly scanned and emailed to funding@kcl.ac.uk.

selection_process.description: The selection process for Ariyaratnam Scholarships is simple and straightforward. Only those applications are considered which are accurately completed and are accompanied by all the required documents.Therefore, it is advisable for all applicants to applicants to complete their applications with utmost care and caution. The final decision and name of the recipients are announced by the end of August.
selection_process.html_content:
The selection process for Ariyaratnam Scholarships is simple and straightforward. Only those applications are considered which are accurately completed and are accompanied by all the required documents.

Therefore, it is advisable for all applicants to applicants to complete their applications with utmost care and caution. The final decision and name of the recipients are announced by the end of August.

Named after Mr. Ineeyan Ariyaratnam, an alumnus of King’s, Ariyaratnam Scholarships are awarded to undergraduate students at King’s College. A few grant details and benefits are mentioned in the following table:

description:
Deakin India 20% Postgraduate Bursary is offered to Indian students commencing any postgraduate degree program at Deakin. Awarded on the basis of their academic excellence, recipients get 20% bursary to cover their tuition and other Deakin postgraduate program study-related costs. 

No Separate applications are to submitted for Deakin India 20% Postgraduate Bursary, as decisions are based on admission applications. Therefore, students must submit their admission application before the upcoming deadline- Trimester 1, 2025

eligibility_criteria.description: In order to secure benefits of Deakin India 20% Postgraduate Bursary, applicants have to meet eligibility criteria listed below:Must be an Indian with a valid passport.Must be residing in India when they apply for this scholarshipAdmission applications should be made through a Deakin agent from India.Obtained an overall score of 55% – 74.99% in the bachelor's program.Also, If a student has achieved an overall score of75% in his undergraduate degree,he/she may be eligible for theDeakin India 25% Merit Scholarship.Please note:this bursary/scholarship (depending on which it is) is only available once you can travel to Australia and commence your studies on-campus. While you are studying online in India (or ‘your home country’ for the South Asia onshore merit scholarship), you may be eligible for theDeakin In-Country 30% Bursary, subject to meeting eligibility criteria.
eligibility_criteria.html_content:
In order to secure benefits of Deakin India 20% Postgraduate Bursary, applicants have to meet eligibility criteria listed below:

  • Must be an Indian with a valid passport.
  • Must be residing in India when they apply for this scholarship
  • Admission applications should be made through a Deakin agent from India.
  • Obtained an overall score of 55% – 74.99% in the bachelor's program.

Also, If a student has achieved an overall score of 75% in his undergraduate degree, he/she may be eligible for the Deakin India 25% Merit Scholarship.

Please note: this bursary/scholarship (depending on which it is) is only available once you can travel to Australia and commence your studies on-campus. While you are studying online in India (or ‘your home country’ for the South Asia onshore merit scholarship), you may be eligible for the Deakin In-Country 30% Bursary, subject to meeting eligibility criteria.

application_process.description: Applicants should be applying through any Deakin Authorised agent-based in INDIA for the scholarship. While applying for theDeakin India 20% Postgraduate Bursary, it’s important to attach all requested supporting documents, otherwise, the application could be delayed or disallowed.List of required documents are :English Language proficiency proof (IELTS/TOEFL/CPE/CAE/PTE)Certified Academic TranscriptsAccompanied by certified English translationsCurriculum Vitae (Encouraged but not essential)Personal statement(might be needed)Scholarship applicant ID (if available)
application_process.html_content:
Applicants should be applying through any Deakin Authorised agent-based in INDIA for the scholarship. While applying for the Deakin India 20% Postgraduate Bursary, it’s important to attach all requested supporting documents, otherwise, the application could be delayed or disallowed.

List of required documents are :

  • English Language proficiency proof (IELTS/TOEFL/CPE/CAE/PTE)
  • Certified Academic Transcripts
    • Accompanied by certified English translations
  • Curriculum Vitae (Encouraged but not essential)
  • Personal statement(might be needed)
  • Scholarship applicant ID (if available)

selection_process.description: Proper documentation of citizenship, academic transcripts, and award certificates must be provided. Since there is no limitation on the number of students who are awarded this, the documentation and eligibility criteria are strictly followed.The recipients of Deakin India 20% of Postgraduate Bursary are selected based on the fulfillment of the eligibility criteria set byDeakin University.They will automatically receive a 20% fee reduction to the total tuition fee stated in the admission letter.
selection_process.html_content:
Proper documentation of citizenship, academic transcripts, and award certificates must be provided. Since there is no limitation on the number of students who are awarded this, the documentation and eligibility criteria are strictly followed.

The recipients of Deakin India 20% of Postgraduate Bursary are selected based on the fulfillment of the eligibility criteria set by Deakin University. They will automatically receive a 20% fee reduction to the total tuition fee stated in the admission letter.

grant_details.description: Deakin University offers more than 250 UG, PG and Doctoral Programs for international students who want tostudy abroad.Deakin University offers many scholarships for international students. One of them is Deakin India 20% Postgraduate Bursary for PG students.Under this scholarship, the student receives20% off on the entire educational expenseswhich he/she has to incur.Deakin University offers an unlimited number of scholarships for eligible candidates. The table below provides all the essential details regarding the Deakin India 20% Postgraduate Bursaryprovided by the Deakin University.Study levelPostgraduateEligibilityIndian StudentsNo. of ScholarshipVariesAward DistributionAnnuallyStudy LengthTwo yearsStudents who wish to study in Australiaat Deakin University can visit the official website for any information.
grant_details.html_content:
Deakin University offers more than 250 UG, PG and Doctoral Programs for international students who want to study abroad. Deakin University offers many scholarships for international students. One of them is Deakin India 20% Postgraduate Bursary for PG students.

Under this scholarship, the student receives 20% off on the entire educational expenses which he/she has to incur.

Deakin University offers an unlimited number of scholarships for eligible candidates. The table below provides all the essential details regarding the Deakin India 20% Postgraduate Bursaryprovided by the Deakin University.

Study level  Postgraduate 
Eligibility  Indian Students 
No. of Scholarship  Varies 
Award Distribution  Annually 
Study Length  Two years 

Students who wish to study in Australia at Deakin University can visit the official website for any information.

description:
The TEC scholarship is awarded by The Elevator Consultants (TEC) a leading firm in the field of elevator consulting which has been helping owners, property managers, engineers and others in optimizing their assets for vertical transportation.

The Elevator Consultants also valued the role of education in the life of an individual and society as a whole. It offers college students a scholarship of 1000 USD. Commitment and hard work of students are what TEC comments and awards.

Applicants have to submit an essay in order to secure benefits provided by TEC scholarship.

The scholarship is available to students pursuing or wish to pursue higher education at universities of U.S, Canada, Australia, etc.

With the need for education, it is important to understand the costs associated with proper education. The cost of education mainly includes tuition fees, books, and supplies, the cost of living and meal plans. The motive of providing such a scholarship is to help students succeed in the present-day world.

eligibility_criteria.description: In order to be selected for the TEC scholarship, applicants have to meet Eligibility Criteria given below:Candidate must either be enrolled or going to enroll in an undergraduate or graduate program at a college.Must be studying a technical degree as majors like engineering, architecture, science or equivalent.Must furnish all required details including a brief introduction about them and most importantly the essay on the assigned topic.
eligibility_criteria.html_content:
In order to be selected for the TEC scholarship, applicants have to meet Eligibility Criteria given below:

  • Candidate must either be enrolled or going to enroll in an undergraduate or graduate program at a college.
  • Must be studying a technical degree as majors like engineering, architecture, science or equivalent.
  • Must furnish all required details including a brief introduction about them and most importantly the essay on the assigned topic.

application_process.description: In order to apply for the TEC Scholarship, applicants have to submit an essay of 1000 words on a topic mentioned on the official website of TEC.There are Two topics provided by TEC to choose from. The topics are as follows:Explain the way(s) in which evolving technology has significantly affected your life?Where would you like to see technology evolve in the future? What areas would you like to see it extend towards?The Elevator Consultants provides services to its clients in fields where there is extensive technology utilization.Therefore, their entire business revolves around the significant technology changes and the way it affects our lives so the essay topics have been kept relatable to it.The completed application should include the applicant’sname, school, choice of majoralong the essay must be sent toinfo@theelevatorconsultant.comwithin the deadline.i.e June 01,2023
application_process.html_content:
In order to apply for the TEC Scholarship, applicants have to submit an essay of 1000 words on a topic mentioned on the official website of TEC.

There are Two topics provided by TEC to choose from. The topics are as follows:

  1. Explain the way(s) in which evolving technology has significantly affected your life?
  2. Where would you like to see technology evolve in the future? What areas would you like to see it extend towards?

The Elevator Consultants provides services to its clients in fields where there is extensive technology utilization.

Therefore, their entire business revolves around the significant technology changes and the way it affects our lives so the essay topics have been kept relatable to it.

The completed application should include the applicant’s name, school, choice of major along the essay must be sent to info@theelevatorconsultant.com within the deadline.i.e June 01,2023

selection_process.description: The selection for TEC scholarship is done on the basis of the essay that is submitted along with the other details.The essays received from all the candidates who meet the eligibility criteria will then be shortlisted and 3 students will be selected for the next round. The selected students will be notified about their position in the ultimate tier.Out of the 3 essays that have been shortlisted, the President of TEC makes the final selection of the awarded by reading the essays.
selection_process.html_content:
The selection for TEC scholarship is done on the basis of the essay that is submitted along with the other details.

The essays received from all the candidates who meet the eligibility criteria will then be shortlisted and 3 students will be selected for the next round. The selected students will be notified about their position in the ultimate tier.

Out of the 3 essays that have been shortlisted, the President of TEC makes the final selection of the awarded by reading the essays.

grant_details.description: The grant ofTEC scholarshipis offered to only one student on an annual basis. The scholarship is given based on the essay submitted by the students. One important tip for all interested candidates would be to focus on the essay and write it in such a way that it leaves an impact on the readers and help to compete with the others.All undergraduate and graduate students pursuing a technical degree are eligible to apply for the scholarship. The scholarship award is1000 USDthat will help a student in financing his/her cost of education.The table below provides all the significant details regarding the TEC Scholarship offered by The Elevator Consultants.Study-LevelUndergraduate and GraduateEligible CandidatesAll technical degree studentsNumber of Scholarships1Study-Length2 to 3 yearsScholarship AwardCost of educationAward DistributedYearlyThe Elevator Consultants’ annual scholarship is a helping hand from the firm towards all aspirants who wish to work in the technical field in the future. It can also be said to be an attempt at building a better environment and utilizing technology to its complete potential.
grant_details.html_content:
The grant of TEC scholarship is offered to only one student on an annual basis. The scholarship is given based on the essay submitted by the students. One important tip for all interested candidates would be to focus on the essay and write it in such a way that it leaves an impact on the readers and help to compete with the others.

All undergraduate and graduate students pursuing a technical degree are eligible to apply for the scholarship. The scholarship award is 1000 USD that will help a student in financing his/her cost of education.

The table below provides all the significant details regarding the TEC Scholarship offered by The Elevator Consultants.

Study-Level Undergraduate and Graduate
Eligible Candidates All technical degree students
Number of Scholarships 1
Study-Length 2 to 3 years
Scholarship Award Cost of education
Award Distributed Yearly

The Elevator Consultants’ annual scholarship is a helping hand from the firm towards all aspirants who wish to work in the technical field in the future. It can also be said to be an attempt at building a better environment and utilizing technology to its complete potential.

scholarship_name: A.S. Mowat Prize Scholarship at Dalhousie University
description:
The A.S. Mowat Prize Scholarship is a type of financial aid offered to international students at Dalhousie University. The students must be enrolled in any master’s program at Dalhousie University to be eligible to apply for the scholarship.

Under the A.S. Mowat Prize, students will receive an award amount of 1500 USD which can be used only for tuition fees.

The award is given in memory of Alexander S. Mowat was an O.E. Smith Professor of Education who served for thirty years at Dalhousie University.

The A.S. Mowat Prize Scholarship provides an award of 1500 USD to recognize the outstanding achievement of a student who is currently in his or her first year of a PG/ Master's program in any discipline at Dalhousie University.

Recipient of the A.S. Mowat Prize can use the award amount for the payment of the PG program tuition fee. Some significant benefits of the A.S. Mowat Prize Scholarship are:

Award Amount 1500 USD
Award Duration 1500 USD is awarded annually for s Masters Program
Applicable Programs All PG programs at the Dalhousie University 

The scholarship is provided to only those meritorious students who need support in financing their studies. The last date for submitting the application forms for the A.S. Mowat Prize is February 01, 2025.

eligibility_criteria.description: A.S. Mowat Prize Scholarship is designed for academically outstanding students at Dalhousie University. Therefore, only the students of the master’s degree at Dalhousie University are eligible for the scholarship.Apart from this, students have to fulfill the eligibility criteria given below to apply for A.S. Mowat Prize Scholarship 2025:Admission in the first yearPG Program at Dalhousie University.Excellent academic grades/ first-class averageStudents must be a full-time student at Dalhousie University and registered in the current term, to apply for or receive the Prize.
eligibility_criteria.html_content:
A.S. Mowat Prize Scholarship is designed for academically outstanding students at Dalhousie University. Therefore, only the students of the master’s degree at Dalhousie University are eligible for the scholarship.

Apart from this, students have to fulfill the eligibility criteria given below to apply for A.S. Mowat Prize Scholarship 2025:

  • Admission in the first year PG Program at Dalhousie University.
  • Excellent academic grades/ first-class average
  • Students must be a full-time student at Dalhousie University and registered in the current term, to apply for or receive the Prize.

application_process.description: A.S. Mowat Prize Scholarship applications are accepted through anoffline process. Applicants must complete the offline forms available at the Dalhousie University website-Financial Aid Application,  and submit it at the given address, along with all the documents.Attachments which should be submitted along with the A.S. Mowat Prize application form is as follows:A maximum one-page statement of the achievements in a graduate program (Optional)A signed support letter from a supervisor or Graduate CoordinatorA copy of the applicant’s transcriptsHow to Apply for A.S. Mowat Prize Scholarship 2025?The step-by-step process to fillA.S. Mowat Prize Scholarship 2025is given below:Step I: Download the form.Step II: Fill out the form with all the correct details.Step III:Attach all the documents along with the application form as given aboveStep IV:Recheck and post all the documents to the specified postal address.Postal Address:Faculty of Graduate StudiesDalhousie UniversityRoom 314Henry Hicks Academic Administration Building6299 South StreetPO BOX 15000 Halifax,NS, Canada, B3H 4R2
application_process.html_content:
A.S. Mowat Prize Scholarship applications are accepted through an offline process. Applicants must complete the offline forms available at the Dalhousie University website-Financial Aid Application,  and submit it at the given address, along with all the documents.

Attachments which should be submitted along with the A.S. Mowat Prize application form is as follows:

  1. A maximum one-page statement of the achievements in a graduate program (Optional)
  2. A signed support letter from a supervisor or Graduate Coordinator
  3. A copy of the applicant’s transcripts

How to Apply for A.S. Mowat Prize Scholarship 2025?

The step-by-step process to fill A.S. Mowat Prize Scholarship 2025 is given below:

Step I: Download the form.Step II: Fill out the form with all the correct details.

Step III: Attach all the documents along with the application form as given above

Step IV: Recheck and post all the documents to the specified postal address.

Postal Address:

Faculty of Graduate Studies
Dalhousie University
Room 314
Henry Hicks Academic Administration Building
6299 South Street
PO BOX 15000 Halifax,
NS, Canada, B3H 4R2

selection_process.description: After the submission of the A.S. Mowat Prize application form, candidates are selected by a panel of selectors of the Dalhousie University.The Faculty of Graduate Studies Officewill send a copy of the applicant’s transcripts to the Selection Committee of the faculty of Graduate study. To secure a scholarship, all sections of the application must be completed before submitting it. Also, there can be no appeals to the decision of the Prize.The recipient will be identified by the Faculty of Graduate Studies Committee of the Dalhousie University based on various factors :Academic ExcellenceFinancial requirementCareer Objective
selection_process.html_content:
After the submission of the A.S. Mowat Prize application form, candidates are selected by a panel of selectors of the Dalhousie University.

The Faculty of Graduate Studies Office will send a copy of the applicant’s transcripts to the Selection Committee of the faculty of Graduate study. To secure a scholarship, all sections of the application must be completed before submitting it. Also, there can be no appeals to the decision of the Prize.

The recipient will be identified by the Faculty of Graduate Studies Committee of the Dalhousie University based on various factors :

  • Academic Excellence
  • Financial requirement
  • Career Objective

grant_details.description: Students who wish to pursuehigher education in Canadaat Dalhousie University can apply for the scholarship. Each year, applications for the A.S. Mowat Prize Scholarship are invited in the month of September. Students are then selected by the officials of the Faculty of Graduate Studies Committee. The A.S. Mowat Prize Scholarship application form has to be completed by the applicants only.The table below provides all the significant details regarding the A.S. Mowat Prize Scholarship program available at Dalhousie University.Study-LevelPostgraduate/ MastersEligible CandidatesInternational students, studying at PG course at the Dalhousie UniversityNumber of ScholarshipNot AvailableStudy-LengthEquivalent to the Master's courseScholarship Award1500 USDAward DistributedAnnuallyAlong with knowing how to obtain the A.S. Mowat Prize Scholarship 2025, it is significant for each applicant to know the scholarship’s terms and conditions.Terms and Conditions of A.S. Mowat PrizeApplications of the A.S. Mowat Prize should be submitted only at the given postal address before the deadline.Students should be entering into his/her first year of PG Studies at Dalhousie University.Students are selected by a panel of selectors of the Faculty of Graduate Studies, and the committee's decision is final and cannot be challenged.Students can only use the scholarship amount for paying out their tuition & fees.Students who wish tostudy in Canadaat Dalhousie University are advised to regularly check the official website for updates.
grant_details.html_content:
Students who wish to pursue higher education in Canada at Dalhousie University can apply for the scholarship. Each year, applications for the A.S. Mowat Prize Scholarship are invited in the month of September. Students are then selected by the officials of the Faculty of Graduate Studies Committee. The A.S. Mowat Prize Scholarship application form has to be completed by the applicants only.

The table below provides all the significant details regarding the A.S. Mowat Prize Scholarship program available at Dalhousie University.

Study-Level Postgraduate/ Masters
Eligible Candidates International students, studying at PG course at the Dalhousie University
Number of Scholarship Not Available
Study-Length Equivalent to the Master's course
Scholarship Award 1500 USD
Award Distributed Annually

Along with knowing how to obtain the A.S. Mowat Prize Scholarship 2025, it is significant for each applicant to know the scholarship’s terms and conditions.

Terms and Conditions of A.S. Mowat Prize

  • Applications of the A.S. Mowat Prize should be submitted only at the given postal address before the deadline.
  • Students should be entering into his/her first year of PG Studies at Dalhousie University.
  • Students are selected by a panel of selectors of the Faculty of Graduate Studies, and the committee's decision is final and cannot be challenged.
  • Students can only use the scholarship amount for paying out their tuition & fees.

Students who wish to study in Canada at Dalhousie University are advised to regularly check the official website for updates.

description:
The Accenture Award is a scholarship program available at the University of Waterloo. The program is specifically designed for students entering their fourth year of undergraduate studies in the fields of Engineering and Mathematics (co-op).

Only full-time students at the University of Waterloo are considered for the Accenture Award. The program is open for everyone, including domestic students, permanent residents, and international students. Every year, the university selects two students as the recipients of this award. Recipients receive an award amount of 2,000 USD. Selections are based on various factors including academic merit, communication skills, etc.

Accenture Award at the University of Waterloo is a tremendous motivation for the students. The award, with its specific selection criteria, definitely drives the students through the early years in their program to excel academically, participate and get involved in as many extracurricular activities as possible.

eligibility_criteria.description: Only full-time UG students of the University of Waterloo, studying either in one of the disciplines under theFaculty of Engineeringor a Co-op Mathematics program are eligible to apply for the Accenture Award.In addition to this, they have to fulfill the requirements listed below:Must be entering the fourth year of their programHave scored a minimum 75% in overall averageExhibit leadership qualities and interest in extracurricular activitiesInterest in pursuing a career in consultingPossess strong communication skills
eligibility_criteria.html_content:
Only full-time UG students of the University of Waterloo, studying either in one of the disciplines under the Faculty of Engineering or a Co-op Mathematics program are eligible to apply for the Accenture Award.

In addition to this, they have to fulfill the requirements listed below:

  • Must be entering the fourth year of their program
  • Have scored a minimum 75% in overall average
  • Exhibit leadership qualities and interest in extracurricular activities
  • Interest in pursuing a career in consulting
  • Possess strong communication skills

application_process.description: The application for the Accenture Award at the University of Waterloo is to be made online through the Undergraduate Studies Forms Page.Currently, the application process is open for the Winter Term (January – April) and the deadline is March 15.The University of Waterloo Accenture Award application process involves:Step I:Completing the Undergraduate Award Application for the applicable term.Step II:Submit an updated resume in support of the application.The Undergraduate Awards Co-ordinator, Jessica Bruni can be contacted via email at jbruni@uwaterloo.ca for further information regarding the Accenture Award – University of Waterloo.
application_process.html_content:
The application for the Accenture Award at the University of Waterloo is to be made online through the Undergraduate Studies Forms Page.

Currently, the application process is open for the Winter Term (January – April) and the deadline is March 15.

The University of Waterloo Accenture Award application process involves:

Step I: Completing the Undergraduate Award Application for the applicable term.

Step II: Submit an updated resume in support of the application.

The Undergraduate Awards Co-ordinator, Jessica Bruni can be contacted via email at jbruni@uwaterloo.ca for further information regarding the Accenture Award – University of Waterloo.

selection_process.description: Only those applications that were completed in all respect and were submitted before the deadline will be evaluated for the Accenture award. As listed in the eligibility criteria, selection of candidates for the award is made after consideration of the following aspects of the candidature:Academic merit.Level of participation and involvement in extracurricular activities.Willingness to work as a consultant in the future.Relevant work-term experience.Shortlisted candidates are usually invited for an interview session with the selection panel. Based on the interviews, the panel selects 2 recipients for the scholarship.
selection_process.html_content:
Only those applications that were completed in all respect and were submitted before the deadline will be evaluated for the Accenture award. As listed in the eligibility criteria, selection of candidates for the award is made after consideration of the following aspects of the candidature:

  • Academic merit.
  • Level of participation and involvement in extracurricular activities.
  • Willingness to work as a consultant in the future.
  • Relevant work-term experience.

Shortlisted candidates are usually invited for an interview session with the selection panel. Based on the interviews, the panel selects 2 recipients for the scholarship.

grant_details.description: Accenture Awards at the University of Waterloo are available to all the students, i.e., domestic students, permanent residents, and international students can apply for this award. However, the applicant must be entering the fourth year of their UG program.Furthermore, the recipients of the Accenture Award are selected from the Waterloo’s Faculty of Engineering and Co-op Mathematics. The deadline for the submission of the Accenture Award 2026 is March 15. Any application submitted after the deadline will not be reviewed.
grant_details.html_content:
Accenture Awards at the University of Waterloo are available to all the students, i.e., domestic students, permanent residents, and international students can apply for this award. However, the applicant must be entering the fourth year of their UG program.

Furthermore, the recipients of the Accenture Award are selected from the Waterloo’s Faculty of Engineering and Co-op Mathematics. The deadline for the submission of the Accenture Award 2026 is March 15. Any application submitted after the deadline will not be reviewed.

description:
We all know that to study abroad and caring for a child, both at the same time, is a difficult task. To ease out this stress, MAWISTA has come up with a new scholarship program, MAWISTA Scholarship, which will be awarded to one person studying at any German University with a child.

All the students with child to support are encouraged to apply for the scholarship and avail its benefits. Since there are not stringent requirements, the application process will take less than 20 minutes.

eligibility_criteria.description: MAWISTA Scholarship program does not have any specific eligibility criteria. Students who are ready to pursue a degree abroad even with a child are encouraged to apply. Applicants should note that factors like the duration of the course and the GPA areNOTtaken into account for determining eligibility.You are required to submit their CV and other academic credentials of the previous courses of study.
eligibility_criteria.html_content:
MAWISTA Scholarship program does not have any specific eligibility criteria. Students who are ready to pursue a degree abroad even with a child are encouraged to apply. Applicants should note that factors like the duration of the course and the GPA are NOT taken into account for determining eligibility.

You are required to submit their CV and other academic credentials of the previous courses of study.

application_process.description: The application process for MAWISTA Scholarship is quite simple. All you have to do is complete an application form available on the official website of MAWISTA.In addition to the submission of the form, tell MAWISTA as to why you should be selected for the scholarship.
application_process.html_content:
The application process for MAWISTA Scholarship is quite simple. All you have to do is complete an application form available on the official website of MAWISTA.

In addition to the submission of the form, tell MAWISTA as to why you should be selected for the scholarship.

selection_process.description: The selection process for MAWISTA Scholarship is well structured. Each application is treated separately. The history/career and personality of the applicant is considered for evaluation of eligibility for this scholarship.For 2024, the MAWISTA selection panel will shortlist five applications by January 30. The final selection will be done on the basis of public voting starting from February 15 until March 1.The name of the recipient will be declared on the MAWISTA website.
selection_process.html_content:
The selection process for MAWISTA Scholarship is well structured. Each application is treated separately. The history/career and personality of the applicant is considered for evaluation of eligibility for this scholarship.

For 2024, the MAWISTA selection panel will shortlist five applications by January 30. The final selection will be done on the basis of public voting starting from February 15 until March 1.

The name of the recipient will be declared on the MAWISTA website.

grant_details.description: The objective of the MAWISTA Scholarship is to help parents manage their child care need along with theirstudies in abroad. It aims to help them pay towards their tuition fees along with other living expenses including the cost of care for their child.The main purpose of this scholarship is to enable the parents to study without having the need to worry of their child’s necessities and care. On the evaluation of all the applications, five applicants are selected for the final round which involves public voting. On the basis of the public votes, one applicant is selected for this scholarship which is worth 6,691 USD.
grant_details.html_content:
The objective of the MAWISTA Scholarship is to help parents manage their child care need along with their studies in abroad. It aims to help them pay towards their tuition fees along with other living expenses including the cost of care for their child.

The main purpose of this scholarship is to enable the parents to study without having the need to worry of their child’s necessities and care. On the evaluation of all the applications, five applicants are selected for the final round which involves public voting. description:
Richard A. Freund International Scholarship, offered by the American Society for Quality (ASQ). A gift of $100,000 has been made to ASQ by Mrs. Richard A. Freund. The scholarship is designed to support international students pursuing a master’s or doctorate in fields of Engineering and Statistics, and working for quality control, quality assurance, total quality management, and quality improvement.

The applicant who wants to enjoy the benefits of Richard A. Freund’s International Scholarship must meet the eligibility criteria specified by ASQ. Along with scholarship eligibility, it is significant for applicants to meet the admission requirements, especially the submission of student supporting documents of their chosen university and country to study abroad.

eligibility_criteria.description: To obtain the benefits Richard A. Freund International Scholarship, applicants have to fulfill the eligibility criteria listed below :Applicants should have a minimum GPA of3.25 or higher, throughout UG and PG study.Applicants pursuing a master’s or higher level of study are eligible,The field of study must be in quality control, quality assurance, quality improvement, total quality management or similar quality emphasis programs.Applicants need not be a member of ASQ.International students are allowed and must not be attending high school currently.
eligibility_criteria.html_content:
To obtain the benefits Richard A. Freund International Scholarship, applicants have to fulfill the eligibility criteria listed below :

  • Applicants should have a minimum GPA of 3.25 or higher, throughout UG and PG study.
  • Applicants pursuing a master’s or higher level of study are eligible,
  • The field of study must be in quality control, quality assurance, quality improvement, total quality management or similar quality emphasis programs.
  • Applicants need not be a member of ASQ.
  • International students are allowed and must not be attending high school currently.

application_process.html_content:
Students will only be accepted only upon submission of documentation indicating the acceptance of enrollment into the programs above mentioned.

A separate online application needs to be filled which can be accessed on ASQ’s website. Students are required to complete the application form and send it through email or courier to the address provided below.

Address:

Freund International Scholarship Committee,
ASQPO Box 3005, 600
North Plankinton AvenueMilwaukee,
WI 53201-3005
USA

Mail:-tborzon@asq.org
Program Administrator
Tel: 800-248-1946 ext. 7580
Fax: 414-765-8670

Applications are required to be submitted before the deadline i.e. April 01. Students must download the pdf/doc of the form available on the website and fill it. They can submit their application form by either emailing program admin or via post.

Student Supporting Documentation

Along with the application, applicants have to attach required documents mentioned below:

  • Academic transcripts from previous institutions
    • Accompanied by certified English translations.
  • Letters of recommendation
    • To assess the candidate’s scholarly and/or work experience.
  • A formal written statement of 250 words addressing the applicant’s educational and career goals and why he/she deserves the scholarship.

Note: Photocopies of transcripts are not accepted by ASQ

As mentioned earlier, Richard A. Freund’s International Scholarship is offered to students pursuing Engineering Degrees and working towards quality control, quality assurance and management. Universities of the U.S., Australia, Canada, the U.K, Germany, Australia offer high-level engineering degrees.

It has been observed that the supporting documentation requirements vary from country to country. Therefore, it is important for students to know the admission requirements in various countries. The country-wise documentation requirements have been tabulated below:

Countries  LOR  Statement of Purpose  Resume  Work Experience 
USA  2 LOR Required Required  Required  Not Required 
Canada  1 LOR Required Required Required Not Required 
UK  1 LOR Required  Required  Required  Not Required 
Germany  Not required Not Required  Required  Not Required 
Australia  Not required  Required  Required  Not Required

selection_process.description: For the 2025 scholarship program, applications along with required documents should be submitted before April 01, 2026. The organization will not entertain any documents submitted after the issued deadline.The Selection Committee of ASQ will evaluateGPA,Essay,LOR,combinedundergraduate and graduate study and workcombining quality assurance and continuous improvement. The committee also focuses on the applicant’s commitment and action toward social responsibility and volunteer work.As only one student gets awarded each year, the applicant who excels over others in all the above prospects will be selected for the award of scholarship. Recipient of the Richard A. Freund International Scholarship will be awarded an amount of 5000 USD.
selection_process.html_content:
For the 2025 scholarship program, applications along with required documents should be submitted before April 01, 2026. The organization will not entertain any documents submitted after the issued deadline.

The Selection Committee of ASQ will evaluate GPA, Essay, LOR, combined undergraduate and graduate study and work combining quality assurance and continuous improvement. The committee also focuses on the applicant’s commitment and action toward social responsibility and volunteer work.

As only one student gets awarded each year, the applicant who excels over others in all the above prospects will be selected for the award of scholarship. Recipient of the Richard A. Freund International Scholarship will be awarded an amount of 5000 USD.

scholarship_name: BP Canada Energy Group ULC Bursary in EPLM 2023
description:
BP Canada Energy Group ULC Bursary in EPLM 2026 is offered by Amoco Canada Petroleum Company Ltd. in collaboration with the University of Calgary. This award is offered annually to continuing undergraduate students who are enrolled in the Haskayne School of Business, for concentrating in Petroleum Land Management.

Under this scholarship, a maximum award amount of 3000 CAD is offered to two students every year. The scholarship is awarded on the basis of:

Recipient of the BP Canada Energy Group ULC Bursary in PLM can use the award amount for the payment of the Undergraduate Petroleum Land Management program’s tuition fee. Some significant benefits of BP Canada Energy Group ULC Bursary are:

Award Amount 3000 CAD
Award Duration 3000 CAD is awarded (one-time)
Applicable Programs Petroleum Land Management at Haskayne School of Business

The scholarship is provided to only those meritorious students of the University of Calgary, who need support in financing their studies. Students must apply before May 01, 2026, to be eligible for the scholarship.

eligibility_criteria.description: BP Canada Energy Group ULC Bursary in EPLMis designed for academically outstanding students, who are enrolled in aPetroleum Land Management Bachelor's program at Haskayne, the University of Calgary.To apply for BP Canada Energy Group ULC Bursary in EPLM 2026, applicants have to fulfill the eligibility criteria listed below :Student type: The student should be entering their 2nd,3rd,4th year of undergraduate studies in the field of Energy and Professional Land Management concentrationCitizenship/residency: AnyAcademics: Excellent academic gradesOnly those students who have securedadmission at Haskayne School of Businessare eligible to apply.

To apply for BP Canada Energy Group ULC Bursary in EPLM 2026, applicants have to fulfill the eligibility criteria listed below :

  • Student type: The student should be entering their 2nd,3rd,4th year of undergraduate studies in the field of Energy and Professional Land Management concentration
  • Citizenship/residency: Any

Only those students who have secured admission at Haskayne School of Business are eligible to apply.

application_process.html_content:
The applicant of the BP Canada Energy Group ULC Bursary in EPLM must apply through the MyUofC portal. This scholarship needs a separate external application.

The Scholarship 2020 applications are accepted through an online process. Applicants have to complete the online BP Canada Energy Group ULC Bursary in the EPLM application and submit it at the University of Calgary Scholarship website.

How to Apply for BP Canada Energy Group ULC Bursary in EPLM 2026?

The step-by-step process for BP Canada Energy Group ULC Bursary in EPLM 2026 is given below:

Step I: Create an ID and sign onto yourMyUofC portal using the same.

Step II: Fill the application form available at the portal for the scholarship.

Step III: Complete the online BP Canada Energy Group ULC Bursary in EPLM Application and submit it.

Applicants must submit scholarship applications before May 01, 2026, to be considered for the selection.

Document deadline: May 10

Recipient Notification: July

selection_process.description: After the submission of theBP Canada Energy Group ULC Bursary in the EPLMapplication form, candidates are then selected by a panel of selectors. Recipients of the scholarship are then notified by email at the end of November.The recipients of the BP Canada Energy Group ULC Bursary in EPLM are selected on the based of factors given below:Academic ExcellenceFinancial NeedCareer Objective
selection_process.html_content:
After the submission of the BP Canada Energy Group ULC Bursary in the EPLM application form, candidates are then selected by a panel of selectors. Recipients of the scholarship are then notified by email at the end of November.

The recipients of the BP Canada Energy Group ULC Bursary in EPLM are selected on the based of factors given below:

  • Academic Excellence
  • Financial Need
  • Career Objective

Award Distributed Annually (one-time)
